title: Well appointed and great location
desc: We stayed at Naumi because of its proximity to Suntec, where we were hosting an event. What we didn't realize was how great it was to be between two lines of the MRT, as well as walking distance to the Raffles Hotel, tons of cool shops and restaurants, and a great little street market two blocks away on the weekend nights. I stayed for business but enjoyed the happy hour from 5 pm to 7 pm and the rooftop pool as well. The Naumi is a luxurious property without the luxurious price tag. Absolutely would recommend!

title: Must-have experience!
desc: Absolutely love the service, the design concept, the comfortability! Room is so spacious and service is v flexible/customized to our needs! The complimentary snacks and drinks were of great quality! Good for couple!!

title: Great experience!
desc: My husband booked a surprise stay for us. Been here but this time, we loved our stay! Very pleasant experience! Staff is great, really efficient and most importanly professional! Been here 4 months ago with my sister, but wasnt impressed at that time as it looked very chaotic at the front desk. They had asked us to sign the registration card again after we completed it few minutes ago, almost misplaced my sister’s ID too. There was a management staff, a lady with blonde like short hair who was screaming at a staff in the lobby. It looked like they haven’t been trained. The staff all seemed so tensed. But this time around, ambience of the lobby was more lively and feels more like 5 star. Staff seemed polite and hospitable. Great improvement! Will definitely come back here

title: A well spent family staycay with excellent service from Staff Amalina
desc: An excellent service by staff Amalina whom assisted me with all my needs throughout my stay. I was able to check in early and the process was very smooth. She even assisted me for the availability timing for the swimming pool booking slots. Staff attended to me with great smile and was very friendly. Overall i am very satisfied with her excellent service 😊. Good job Amalina! Keep it up with the good smile!

title: SHN Staycation
desc: Stayed 7 nights for my SHN during a stopover in Singapore. The attention and service level by all the staff made the confinement more bearable and eases the stress being indoor all the time. They were quick to respond to all requests and made swift delivery of the food order i did online. Special mention to Wai Kin and Ryan.

title: The Best We Had!!!!
desc: My stay experience in Naumi was great. The team was very helpful,answered all our questions & went beyond our expectations in terms of service. We loved the hotel concept and roof top pool were awesome. The team also decorated our room as it was our anniversary. One of the best services we had!! I would recommend everyone to have a staycation or any special occasion at Naumi!!! Thank you naumi! You have made our anniversay so memorable!!!

title: Quiet and Safe Area
desc: The Naumi is a great modern boutique hotel, next door to the famous Raffles Hotel, about a 5 min walk to Bugis shopping centre and markets and also next door to some amazing restaurants and a great gin bar. The Naumi is small by comparison, less crowds which was great, but you do at times feel it is just a little too small. We booked it for the pool view and it does not disappoint. The rooms are modern, clean with free drinks and food, electric blinds, Nespresso coffee machine. There was no room for our big suitcases though. Staff are friendly. It is not close to an MRT

title: Pleasant stay
desc: Wanted to surprise my other half but got more than expected. Really grateful for the wonderful an beautiful experience. Truly recommend Naumi Hotel to all who needs a good break and relaxation. Coming back again!

title: Naumi Hotel excellent experience
desc: Splendid experience that will get me coming back again! The staff are attentive and patient. Ambience is super cosy and yet romantic. Nice getaway that is worth every penny. Cant wait to return! Thank you Naumi Hotel🤗

title: Awesome and Helpful Staff
desc: Room is great. Not high storey but pretty well maintained and was quite sound proof. In the morning, if not for the sound proof room, I would have been awakened by the loud cries of the baby who probably stayed next door (could hear a bit but weak enough to let me continue to sleep). Check in wise, there was delay and yet the front-desks personnel were apologetic and were upfront frank to tell us how long the delay may take and they were accurately in the estimated delay and the delay was not unusually unreasonable (less than 1 hour). They offered to safekeeping my luggage while I roam around the place which is accessible to many shopping centres. When there is a change of duties, the new front desk personnel (female staff who was at the front desk at 8pm) continued to show

title: Review
desc: I had an amazing experience here. The feel, the ambience, the rooms, and pool is just perfect. The staff are exceptional, notable are the front office procedures and staff... The hotel manager is very friendly.

title: Will come back
desc: We came for a 2 days staycation to celebrate my boyfriend birthday. I have arranged a birthday surprise together with the front desk. The Front desk girl arranged everything in the room beforehand. They also decorated our room, this is so thoughtful of them. We have already made plans to come back next month for my birthday. Good memories.

title: Great hotel
desc: Excellent room. We stay in nirwana hotel. The bed is comfortable and the bath tub is awesome. The staff is great too!! There lots of good food beside the hotel and the location is a plus point. There is bus stop like less than 100 meters and the buses are runing to the city center.

title: Great experience
desc: Really pleasant experience at the hotel - the rooftop pool being the highlight. Modern amenities and a great location - close to central and many great restaurants. Breakfast was healthy and filling. The free gift to leave with was a bonus too. All staff we interacted with were friendly and courteous.

title: Staycation
desc: Lovely stay, we stayed for a night for our anniversary. Amazing and beautiful roof top and swimming pool. Very well connected to the city. We would come back again for a longer stay. Thank you staff at Hotel Naumi for a wonderful stay.

title: Great stay
desc: We arrived at the Hotel and the staff welcomed us and made us seat and do the registration. Served us with welcome drinks. Roof TOP was amazing and the view. Naumi location was very good and will definitely come back again.

title: Perfect Staycation
desc: We were told to try the Naumi roof top pool and the Room Nirwana.. We definitely made the best choice! When we arrived, we were seated and were served with welcome drinks. We received a warm welcome by the Naumi team. The manager Sutha personally welcomed us and informed us that the room would be ready in few minutes. She also gave us her business card to call her directly for any enquires. After few minutes we got our room and to our surprise the room was decorated with flowers as it was my partner's birthday. Thank you to Naumi and the management. We hope to return back once again!

title: Short staycay
desc: My recent staycation at Naumi Hotel was a very pleasant experience. The staff were all very friendly. Check in staff was exceptional in providing assistance and efficient in their speed and friendly too. The room service and menu choice was also good. Will definitely return for a next stay.

title: Bad service and sloppy housekeeping
desc: The hotel is nicely decorated with art and the rooftop infinity pool is nice but the service is disappointing and housekeeping is bad, below the standard of a 5 star hotel. I had most issues with the housekeeping. My room wasn’t cleaned on 3 separate days, even after I complained several times. I had been out from 9 am and found the room uncleaned when I returned at 9:30 pm on one day and 6 pm on another day. They didn’t clean my room until 5:30 pm an another day. They tried to tell me that they clean checking out rooms first but I’ve never had any housekeeping come so late or not at all at any other hotel. The housekeeping was also very sloppy, when they actually came. The floors were never vacuumed or mopped with hair and dirt visible on the floor, rubbish not emptied,

title: Best Stay
desc: We came to Naumi Singapore to celebrate my daughter birthday. The hotel gave us a birthday cake and it was very thoughtful of the team. The room we stayed was very cosy and nice. The reception and the housekeeping team were very responsive and quick. We will come back for our next vacation.

title: Good Location and Pleasant Stay
desc: It was a wonderful stay. A most enjoyable stay for 2 nights and service was impeccable. Upon check in, we were pleased to note that there was an upgrade provided to us to the Oasis Room, when we visited the room there a complementary cake for us. At each point, during our stay the service was spectacular, also the food was superb at Florian, breakfast dishes were super delicious and something out of ordinary. Spectacular view from the pool - Cloud 9, eventhough is a very small pool but is the best place to capture the sunrise and sunset. If you like to increase your instagram followers, this place has it all!

title: A muuuuust return ❤️❤️
desc: One of the best hotels I've been to. The feel, the ambience, the rooms, and pool is just perfect. The staff are exceptional, notable are the front office procedures and staff... The hotel manager is very warm and friendly. I must visit again.

title: Great choice
desc: It was my friend birthday and the hotel provide nice cake and complimentary decorations as well. We love the pool and the view. Nearby there were so many options for food and drinks. We will recommend to our friends and family. Thank you Naumi and all the staff for making our stay memorable one.

title: Leisure stay
desc: I was there for a birthday celebration and it was done for us in a wonderful way. The service was excellent and the room was nice. I was really impressed. The ambience also was nice. Recommended to stay at Naumi Hotel 👍👍

title: Wonderful Staycation
desc: Had a great staycation. I am very delighted with the staffs (Rayan & Wan Ting), who were very friendly and welcoming. I really like the concept of the room, very spacious, comfortable and perfect. I am also impressed by the friendly staff, Syukran, who delivers our food to our door. Thank you Naumi for the memorable staycation. We will definitely come back again!

title: Thimbs up
desc: Me and wife had a awesome staycay at naumi hotel. Not forgetting the awesome view from the pool. The manager, Tineshwaran is very helpful in assisting us in our needs. He provide good hospitality, polite and we recommend others to stay there. Thumbs up! Keep up the good work. Thank you for going an extra mile.

title: Lovely stay
desc: The room was beyond my expectations. The swimming pool is awesomely and beautiful view overseeing the city. I would like to also compliment one of their staff, Tineshwaran for his patience, professional attitude and always with a smile on. Thumbs up! Keep up with the good work. 🤗

title: Service Recovery was great!
desc: Stayed in the patio room for 3 nights, the space was sufficient and comfy. The location of the hotel is good. On the second day of my stay, I had a minor incident. It had rained the night before, and I decided to spend some time in the patio area the following day. When I stepped on a particular wood plank, it snapped and broke, and I almost injured myself. I went to the lobby and informed a member of staff, and they immediately replaced the wooden plank. Thank you Syukran for your prompt response and incredible hospitality! If I ever return and stay with Naumi Hotel, it will be solely due to the team's service. 💯

title: Nice service
desc: - Best deaf friendly service provided ! Appreciate your help! You are awesome Rayan! - Very nice view from the swimming pool at the top floor. - Cool interior design Will definitely come again and recommend it to others!

title: Birthday Celebration 🎉
desc: Efficient and Convenient Check-in process, the staffs who attended to me were knowledgeable and cheerful. The room was cozy, well-made and tidy. Overall, I had a pleasant stay at Naumi Hotel, great for couples / friendly celebration

title: Invited by a friend
desc: Hi all, i really appreciate that this employee Rayan at naumi hotel helps to make the stay very memorable with his exceptional service. He helps to assist with the needs of mine, really appreciate that a lot 🙏👍

title: Amazing Service!
desc: As being deaf, Rayan did his best to accommodate our needs and ensure that we have the smooth & enjoyable staycation. Will recommend to friends and family members for the staycation at Naumi Hotel. This area is also very convenient to few nearby shopping malls

title: Great staycation
desc: Here over the NYE period so there were quite a number of people checking in at the same time but we were assisted by Raihan (hope we got the name right!) promptly. Rest of the staff we met during our stay were also very friendly. Our habitat room was located on level 7. Room size was decent for 2 of us; well equipped with necessary amenities. No complimentary parking so we parked at Beach Centre which is just right opposite the hotel ($15 for the ~24 hours we were there) All in all a great experience! :)

title: Rayan made our 8th Year Anniversary extra special
desc: My partner and I celebrated our 8th year anniversary in the Eden Suite. Rayan greeted us during check in with everything already prepared, and our check in was seamless. The room surpassed our expectations and Rayan was always available no matter the time for all our requests. He even personally sent up our bottle of wine. I highly highly recommend booking Naumi, this was the best staycation we have experienced— definitely worth every penny. Thank you again to Rayan and the team, we look forward to seeing you again.

title: Thank you naumi hotel
desc: Best ever hotel I really loved it alot. ...:) thank you for the lovely decor for my husband birthday I'm very very happy the bathtub is to die for the breakfast was excellent I really enjoy my stay Hope to see u soon

title: Great service and nice staycation
desc: I would like to applaud Staff Rayan for making a lot for exceptional services with regards to my requests for the Naumi Hotel Stay. Good view from the room! Will come back again for the staycation! Really good services provided!

title: Naumi Hotel - great honeymoon stay!!
desc: We had a great stay here, everyone was helpful and service was good. Loved the Eden room’s design and the rooftop pool was cute with a nice view of the city. Small issue with the rain shower toggle but nothing serious. Will definitely be back!

title: Overall good stay
desc: Our recent stay at Naumi was pleasant and we really enjoyed ourselves. The team was very helpful and friendly. Check in at the reception was quick & smooth. Nice welcome note by the Hotel Services Manager. Fabulous pool and nice skyline view of Singapore. We are already planning our next vacation in Singapore.

title: Relaxing and quiet stay, awesome city skyline view
desc: Booked a patio room. Rayan at the front desk was helpful and friendly with the checking in and out. I was pleasantly surprised to be able to connect my apple devices to the tv, and there’s Apple TV too. Rooftop pool/ bar has awesome views of the city skyline, especially at night. Housekeeping and service staff were friendly. Room was clean and quiet. There are many eateries nearby, and it’s a short walk to the malls: Bugis+ and Bugis Junction.

title: Great hotel Stay
desc: My stay at Naumi was indeed pleasant , I was amazed by the hospitality of Rayan earlier on Monday when I checked out and during the morning where he greeted me with a big warm smile asked about my sleep and assisted me with my luggage 🧳 Anson also made my check in easy extremely easy and smooth with assisting and informing me on all the information about the hotel Thank you Naumi Hotel

title: Great hospitality
desc: excellent service at the hotel especially the front desk person syukran for his warm hospitality, 10/10 for the hotel room especially the bathtub and the pool view definitely will visit here soon and recommend it to my friends or families!

title: Wonderful stay
desc: Anson made our stay memorable. He showed us to our room and explained the amenities inside. He recommended (Cloud 9) bar beside the pool, and we tool his advice and enjoyed our time there. During our stay, Anson took care of our requests too.

title: Frontline service and condition of Room and could be improved
desc: We stayed in the Gabrielle and Camellia Room in late Feb 2022. We had booked a Designer Escapade package, which included welcome drinks, bottle of prosecco and "strawberry and chocolates platter delivered directly to your room". However, we were not informed of where to go for the welcome drinks, and no one delivered the platter until we had to call the Concierge the next day when we were to checkout. There was no strawberries platter, instead we were given chocolates- which were 2 small pack of 3 Ferrero Rocher. Hardly the warm welcome we had imagined from the website's description. The Room itself was cosy and well-designed with a nice bathtub, but it was in disrepair. Part of the curtain was drooping off, and one pane of the magic glass was not working. The "premium"

title: Staycation in Singapore
desc: Lovely hotel, amazing staff! They brought us up to the room and even offered to bring our bags up. Room was quite small but very clean and bed was comfy. Mexican restaurant beside the hotel is good! Would come back again

title: Relaxing And Calming Trip
desc: What a Staycay Indeed ! Stayed at Naumi hotel for a break from the bussing country with all the stress and work , much appreciative of the hospitality rayan provided with assisting me late in the evening with my check in and assisting me to my room where he explained the Space efficient room to me . He also suggested me the evening slot for swimming , Which i tried it out on my second day and the sunset it was amazing Thank you Naumi ! A must go place for hospitality and Swimming .

title: Great Stay!
desc: Overall a nice hotel for a short staycay! Although we only stayed for one night, we loved that the TV has Netflix! Would love to have bidets in the toilet, thank you to all the staff for a pleasant stay and experience! :)

title: Clean and good hospitality
desc: Enjoyed the stay with my husband! Was good and clean, Farah, Amalina and Anson were very hospitable and saw to all our needs. The view from Level 10 cloud 9 bar was beautiful. Excellent stay cation venue!

title: Great stay
desc: The stay was pleasant and the service was very good and fast, special thanks to Amal for the great hostility and I’m looking forward to my next stay here. I’m was also very appeased by the room service and food here, which were one of the best I ate at a hotel

title: Amazing Customer Service , Amazing Pool
desc: I really enjoyed the luxurious and heartwarming stay at Naumi Hotel , I was greeted by the warm smiles of Rayan upon my arrival , He chatted about my flight from Australia , assisted me with my luggage and even introduced me the wonderful art pieces before I headed up to my room . The pool view was just breathtaking , delightful and relaxing . Sad part was the room did not come with a bidet , but the netflix made up for it . It was a long business travel stay , however Naumi Hotel made it amazing . Not to forget of when i was assisted by Anson upon my checkout with loading my baggage. Hope to see you soon Naumi .

title: Great Customer Experience and Pool
desc: We came to drop our bags but they informed us that there might be a room, and they allowed us to check in at 10+ and the staff were great (Rayan, Wing Kim (?)) in providing an excellent service to us during our stay.

title: Divine experience with world-class customer service!
desc: Such a quaint and quiet hotel, the pool is amazing with great vibes — felt super relaxed! The room itself is quite spacious and the bed is really comfortable, lots of wine glasses to choose from too. 10/10, will be back soon!

title: Don’t book. U will regret , trust me
desc: It is not really a five- star hotel. I thought it is Japanese five star hotel with Japanese hospitality . Indeed , I was wrong , it is a independent property owned by a Indian owner. The service is not good , I request for late check out , they only give me 30 min to 12:30 pm , after that he calls me and said he can give up to 1 pm. It is such a disappointment even the rooms are so empty the hotel staffs are unable to offer slightly late check out . The gym is super small, the gym is small too. U will charged additional $100 plus if u want to have a bathtub room . Don’t spend your precision and time on staycation in such a poor service property . There is no international hospitality standard compared with bigger Brand’s such as accor , IHG, even local hotels such as Far East

title: Memorable Staycay
desc: Anniversary Staycay hits different, We enjoyed the Luxurious designer room bathtub which made us feel like it was a dungeon and the comfortable sofa balls haha... Staff rayan also surprised us at our room door with a complimentary slice of cake , Wishing both of us a Happy anniversary which made us feel really happy . We also managed to get a nice glass of aperolspritz which was served by their staff named Boy who chatted with us and gave us a good time .

title: Not worth the money
desc: Expensive and room only has a super small window. A wall blocked 7/8 of the natural light. Staff was okay -- Malay lady manning the front desk was phenomenal, others... not so much. Bartender told us we was going to waive our mojito and ended up charging us. Front desk man told us we cant sit at the restaurant despite it being empty. Because the hotel doesn't have a lobby. Also, water is from the tap, tastes bad. They say mini bar is free but our fridge was empty. Small little things like that makes it seem like a 3star hotel instead of a 5 star. For the under $300 category, number one choice is still Robertson Quay

title: An excellent boutique Hotel.
desc: Friendly and accommodative staffs, they really try to make all my requests delivered. A 10/10 for their service, pls keep it up! Managed to book at a very affordable rate just nice before Singapore is opening back to tourists. So in love with their dine in menu and yes, there rooftop Bar and Pool. Definitely will recommend to all friends. Suitable for Business, solo and Friends Travellers. Of course, Couple too since they will decorate your room into a Honeymoon decoration.

title: Naumi hotel was such a pleasant and enjoyable stay
desc: We loved our stay at Naumi. The staff were so friendly and helpful. They made it such an enjoyable experience. They really went above and beyond. The rooms were extremely well laid out and extremely clean with everything you need. Will definitely come back. Thank you so much naumi hotel.

title: AWESOME Honeymoon and staycation
desc: Best staycation ever! Check in was quick and seamless. Staff was really hospitable and friendly. Made us feel so at home. They gave us suggestions on nearby eateries, places to chillax and spa. Saved us time to google. Room was a surprise as it was so beautifully decorated and cosy. Loved the room design and concept. Best part was that the snacks bar was complimentary. That was a bonus. The rooftop pool cannot be missed out. It has an awesome view and bar. That was our favourite part. Chilling with a drink then relax in the pool enjoying the city view. This pool is a must! Hotel staff are always available and quick to respond. Love their attentiveness to detail. Makes the stay even more comfortable. Naumi Hotel is right smack in the best location. Food, drinks, spa, movies and

title: Feedback for staycation from 29/3-30/3
desc: - Swift process of checking in and out - Friendly and professional staffs (Commendable services from Lady receptionist - didn’t catch her name, Male hotelier; Rayan and housekeeping team) - Clean room with complimentary in bar beverages - Beautiful skyline view from infinity pool - Pretty interior designs 10/10 would recommend the hotel 🙌🏻

title: Elegant Hotel. Amazing Team!
desc: Naumi is a beautiful hotel. Great location! Close to ATMs, shopping and eateries. Hotel is clean, classy and elegant. Service is impeccable and the team are incredibly friendly. Nothing is ever a trouble for them. A special shout out to Rayan and the management for all your help and amazing service. We are so happy with our stay and will return again. Thank you all for making us feel like home away from home and this wonderful experience in Singapore!

title: Review
desc: Naumi hotel was decent , the rooms were Abit small and sadly no bathtub unless I book the higher category however one thing that carried the entire trip was the Team and the hospitality that came along which made my trip a homely one , Staff greeted me with warm smiles and assisted me in research about possible attractions and activities I could do , Anson assisted us in the middle of the night after we broke a wine glass which was much appreciated and Rayan made us happy with giving us departure gifts and forgoing the Wine Glass which we broke !

title: Nice Experience
desc: Stayed two nights and had a great time. Staff was very friendly and the pool was extremely marvellous. will definitely come back again. The room was nice a comfortable, and has a great infotainment system.

title: Hotel 10 out of 10
desc: Recommended by tineshwaran old buddy from police force.. room space was huge. Receptionist was so friendly. Please do come and stay in this hotel. Very convenient. Super love the swimming pool view. So relaxing at the top bar area. Hotel rate is 10 out of 10.

title: Nice stay at Naumi Hotel
desc: The room was great, and the pool was clean. We went on a weekday, so there were not as much crowds fighting with us for space and facilities. Had a great and relaxing time at Naumi Hotel. Would definitely recommend people to stay here!

title: Great stay at naumi hotel
desc: Went on a weekday and the swimming pool is relatively empty. The room is also relatively clean with a good size bed for couple. The location is also great with ample of food options around in the area.

title: The best service ever
desc: The decoration is lovely, a pool with amazing view , and a very kind personal who propose us great services to enjoy our stay in singapoor. They keep our luaguage to be free to visit the city and offee a a late chekout. Thank you I really recommand.

title: Relax staycay
desc: It was all good. Room. Timing, and everything. Location is. Good as well. Staff was friendly and gentle. Would. Recommend and. Come. Again for my next staycay. Love the pool at top floor. Really let me feel wad is all slow, plain, simple Luxury moment for someone who is always BUSY XD Good day. Cheers

title: BEST TRIP EVER !!!!!!
desc: Naumi was indeed pleasant and they delivered to my high expectation, from cleanliness to hospitality, Front office was amazing and the housekeeping was outstanding the way they bowed and greeted me, upon my check out I was assisted by the staff Ryan (if I’m right ) to place my luggage in the car before I leave for the airport.

title: Awesome stay
desc: Great location. Room is very nice and everyone is very friendly and attentive, especially the night shift his name was shukran if im not mistaken. The pool view is very nice. Will definitely come back.

title: Great hotel
desc: Stayed here for one night. Really cool hotel, the staff are very helpful and polite. Special thanks to Riyan. Location is great, close to an MRT station. Good places to get a drink close by and food. Good

title: Fabulous hotel
desc: Lovely boutique hotel, very good quality and value for money. Not the cheapest, nor most expensive but definitely a wonderful place to stay. 10 minutes away from Bugis shopping district, walking to MBS within 20 minutes or so. Breeze Bar, Raffles Hotel and Sing Swee Kee famous chicken rice all on the doorstep. Really friendly staff who made sure I was looked after during my stay. Highly recommended.

title: Staycation
desc: Great hospitality, highly recommended hotel. Great facilities and great accommodation for family and friends wanting to experience an extremely fun and joyous vacation. Hotel staff were serving us at an extremely high level of professionalism. Once again, highly recommended hotel.

title: Naumi Hotel Review - Nirwana Room
desc: Overall great space and service! The Nirwana room was really spacious and the bathtub is really a great feature. Check in was seamless as well, and the staff were really accommodating to all requests!

title: Overall
desc: Location is very strategic and walking distance can have many food restaurants. The staff is nice and the room also very clean. Surrounding areas is very safe. Just 10min walking distance can reach suntech mall.

title: A hidden gem with an amazing rooftop pool
desc: The rooftop bar and pool here are absolutely excellent! It’s also so well located just behind Raffles Hotel. Entry level rooms (we were just staying one night) were comfortable but compact so for longer stays you might want to upgrade. We had a baby in a cot and all his stuff so it was a bit tight for any more than a night or two. Breakfast is a light plated affair but there is an excellent Taco place next door for a brunch if that’s more your thing. Design is very cool and the downstairs bar has a buzzy feel at night. Extremely good value for money. Just a tip if you have questions or need help from reception prior to check in ensure you leave plenty of time as they were not able to get back to me before I checked in for my stay as I booked the day before. Staff are kind and

title: Not as expected.
desc: At arrival, the bed sheet was stained. Dirty teaspoon found on arrival. These issues were solved quickly. Body lotion and soap provided were expired from 3 months ago. I spoke with hotel manager about it and I showed her the 2 soaps and 1 body lotion expired, but the outcome was that no other body lotion or soap bar was provided to replace any of it. :( Breakfast selection is very poor. Only 2 choices available and it is unusual not to be able to provide juice, coffee and tea. You must choose only one and if you want another one or something else, you must pay for it. For our stay of 8 days we had the same breakfast every day. Boring. 25SGD for that kind of breakfast is to much. Poor selection of items in the minibar: Coke, Sprite, Coconut water, tropical juice. There were

title: Romantic Staycation moment package stay
desc: Was slightly disappointed with the hotel staff and dining staff as the complimentary dinner for two was not able to be done for us during our stay. I would propose the hotel staff to inform the customers during their arrival that complimentary dinner have to be booked by hotel staff. Secondly, the restaurant was not packed on that day and I went down for an early dinner. I was wondering how are they not able to prepare it since it’s an limited option from the menu or a set meal. Utterly disappointed. However, the room was clean and nicely design to have a cozy feel. The location was good too since it’s quite near to Raffles City shopping mall and a number of restaurants and bars nearby.

title: Not bad at all!
desc: Friendly staff, very clean, good location, good food to hotel's restaurant. Not many options on the rooftop bar (I think that's only minus). At that time was nobody to the rooftop bar, not many options to enjoy the view with a good quality drink

title: Pleasant stay
desc: Nice boutique hotel, v convenient location to all the big shopping centres, nice and clean, friendly staff. I love the rooftop infinity pool. We booked 2 rooms, the couples room is good, but my teenage kids had a twin share room with no windows.

title: Not anymore a great place to stay in Singapore...
desc: No breakfast buffet, bedrooms overused, very noisy private party on the rooftop make my stay not as good as it used to be... The staff is not homogeneous : some people are great and super efficient some other are simply pointless...

title: Returning to Naumi
desc: Lovely boutique hotel nestled behind Raffles. Really great location for restaurants shopping and entertainment. My fave is the rooftop pool overlooking Singapore. The Staff were very accommodating. Rayan was amazing making sure our stay was enjoyable and seamless.

title: Worst accomadating staff ever
desc: totally destroyed my birthday booking. nonsense rigid staff. got charged additional cleaning fees, and i believe everyone agrees no hotel ever charges this. Definitely not recommended, there are much better places

title: Our new favourite Singapore Hotel.
desc: We have just spent 3 nights at the Naumi. This was our 5th visit to Singapore and each time we have stayed in a different hotel. I always look around for good value so we usually avoid the hign end priced places. We purchased a Luxury Escapes deal for the Naumi. Firstly the location was perfect. Right amongst the big names. Across the street from Raffles and the Marriot and within walking distance to many of our favourite areas including Hawker Centres and many other dining options. The rooms were very functional and the boutique hotel is decorated with lots of interesting artwork. The highlight of the hotel is undoubtably the rooftop infinity pool and pool deck. We spent each evening there admiring the stunning veiw of downtown Singapore. Breakfast which was included in our

title: poor overall experience
desc: poor customer service, staff wasn't apologetic when blinds were spoilt and demanded us to move to another room. house keeping was not prompt. called and inform the staff at 1130am to clean the room but when we are back from lunch at 2pm, it was not even done. - TV resolution in the room was VERY poor. please bring laptop and ipad to watch shoes.

title: Weekend at Naumi
desc: Impromptu booking for a weekend, and we were pleasantly surprised by this gem in a very central location, quick walk from city hall MRT with loads of dining options. All staff we encountered were super friendly and helpful and we really appreciated the complimentary late check out time of 4pm.

title: Our amazing stay! Highly recommended!
desc: It was our 1st time at Naumi Hotel, very artistic. Definitely love the room and not to forget the rooftop pool with the view was fantastic! Check-in was smooth. Friendly warm welcoming service from the staffs. And not to forget, our night was greatly taken care by a staff named Syukran. Thank you for the prompt service.

title: Cosy hotel in the heart of the city
desc: Naumi Hotel Singapore is located right in the heart of the city. It is accessible to the both the old and modern parts of town. The pool and rooftop bar gives unbeatable views from this part of town. Service is friendly but could be a little more attentive.

title: Pleasant visit!
desc: Reception staff were super nice and helpful and even offered to send us up to our room (we said no need). For a boutique hotel, the interior design is really gorgeous and expensive-looking. The corridor and lifts are quite dark though, so walk carefully if you have old folks who have bad eyesight. However, when we entered our room, it was so well-lit and spacious! The natural-stone-looking sink area is beautiful too. Housekeeping was also very prompt when we asked for a bucket of ice for our drinks. There's also netflix and apple tv installed so all you need is to log in. One bad thing is that their pillows are kind of hard and uncomfortable to sleep on. I had a good sleep but woke up with a slight neck ache the next day. Overall would still go back!

title: A wonderful stay
desc: This boutique hotel has an amazing location for getting around and choice of eateries. The staff were super friendly and helpful. The rooms were really comfy offering all the creature comforts. So glad we chose this hotel.

title: Pleasant stay and beautiful artistic hotel
desc: Love the place. A lot of nice artworks. The hotel food is above average. Not just the breakfast but also lunch and dinner. The restaurant is pretty decent. Overall it was a relaxing stay and I highly recommend this place.

title: Im so going to come back again!
desc: We had great stay for 4 nights. Great location: close to mrt, shopping malls and many restraurants. Facility: Nice gyms and swimming pool. Room: Clean and Tidy. We had compliementary Water/ tea and coffee

title: Nice stay
desc: A nice, quite spacious and luxurious stay for a small hotel. Front desk staffs are friendly and would like to mention a staff by the name of syukran whom is helpful and attentive upon our needs. Thank you for the wonderful services.

title: Nice Experience at Naumi Hotel
desc: Good & Friendly Staff, Infinity pool with nice view. Good spacious hotel room with 2 adults & 1 kid Location is good, many food oultlet area like Jalan Sultan, Bencoolen & Bugis Junction, all are walking Distance

title: Not bad stay in Habitat Room
desc: Booked this room for our Anniversary for 3d2n.. wanted to do a early check in but i tried calling the hotel a day b4 a few times but it went unanswered.. so end up we went to check in at 3plus instead after waiting for awhile for the room to be ready.. Staff was v nice n friendly the Habitat Room was v comfortable, bed was comfortable, wifi was fast and even have Smart TV to watch Netflix, Disney+ and etc.. the rooftop pool was small but the view is nice! There's a small designated smoking area at the roof top.. the the rooftop is open all night.. so if u wanna catch a view u can go up late at night when there's nobody!😊 There's free drinks in the fridge too.. but only for 1st round.. There's a nespresso machine but too bad it did not work when we try to use it.. Well they

title: Little Gem in crowded City
desc: Lovely and helpful staffs! Service excellent and friendly staffs. Located right in the heart of City. Room is spacious, modern and unique. Price is affordable compared to other 5 ⭐️ Hotels. Definitely will visit again with my son soon. And yes, not forget to mention, the rooftop pool is fantastic.

title: Great Experience
desc: My wife and I stayed three nights at Naumi Hotel Singapore. We booked the Oasis Room but were upgraded on arrival to the designer Suit without asking. Lovely big freestanding bath and rainfall shower head. The hotel and room was very clean, presented really well and the hotel staff were very accommodating. Everything in the minibar was free on the first occasion. The location of the hotel is in a really great spot - plenty of food options just on the block itself and a short walk to the train station. The pool had a great outlook to the CBD and was the perfect temperature. My one and only issue with the hotel was that the roof top bar, by the pool, was not open. From my understanding they would staff it and open it for an extra fee which I didn't do. I would recommend this

title: Naumi Hotel Has Great Location & Service
desc: The hotel is situated in a very centralized area. Its next door to a number of restaurants and drinking places such as Tess, Papi Tacos and if you walk further up there is Haji Lane/Arab street where it offers a variety of food and drinks. If a traveller would like to try out local food there is Yy coffeeshop at 37 Beach road which is a stone throw walk from the hotel. The staff at the recep counter were friendly and they accede to all my requests for the room. They have a nice rooftop lounge, Cloud 9 which is cosy as well and offers a nice view of the downtown Singapore

title: Terrible experience
desc: Inefficient cleaning staff, aircondition was not working, delayed service recovery and did not get the room that i paid for due to them being fully booked. Came in at 4.30pm, room was only ready by 5.30pm. Our dinner plans and activities got delayed due to this. Had to move to a smaller room at 12midnight as the aircondition was not working and there was no similar room available.

title: Superb Hotel
desc: Very nice hotel, great location to travel all around town from. Especially loved the infinity pool! Only two downs from our side was the poor lighting in the room (Make-up) and the very limited storage for clothing.

title: Recommend
desc: Location was convenient and very accessible. I love the outdoor design of it. Love the vibes, design and cleanliness of the hotel. Would definitely recommend you guys to try it. Thank you for the service.

title: Pleasant time
desc: Very nicely designed hotel, very good view at infinity pool and modern. I stayed at habitat king room and it was really comfortable. Bathroom and sink design gives are very nice character to the room. Staff is very helpful and friendly.

title: Wany is what Singapore’s hospitality needs
desc: I just wanted to express my gratitude for the service I’ve received from Wany. She has a great future ahead in hospitality; anticipating my needs such as organising a taxi; which has been an incredibly challenging part of the trip. Wany has made my experience in Singapore less stressful and was a pleasure deal with. Best

title: Amazing Boutique Hotel Experience
desc: We stayed in the hotel for 2 nights over the long weekend (1 May to 3 May 2022). It was my first stay in a boutique hotel, and I was pleasantly surprised that a boutique hotel could deliver what big hotels could offer. - Location: The hotel's location is PERFECT, within walkable distance to the major attractions and transport links. Within the vicinity (Seah St / Purvis St), there are also plenty of food options available, from local cuisine to international delights. - Service: The staff we have interacted were warm and professional, even though there is evidently an issue of understaffing throughout the hotel. A special shoutout to 2 staff – Wany and Farah – who assisted us with our requests promptly throughout the stay. Kudos to the two front-desk crew 😊 - Room: We

title: Great and clean
desc: Had an great stay at Naumi, location was wonderful. Room was clean and hotel facilities were great. There are room for improvements but it doesn't affect the stay that much. The entertainment(TV), could be more android friendly, or could allow access to browser or YouTube would be great.

title: Great!
desc: I would absolutely stay here again on my next visit to Singapore. Absolutely perfect hotel, small, intimate, well maintained. Brilliant location right in the heart of Singapore with access to everything.

title: Not able to provide room service or have the pool bar open during the day
desc: Lovely rooms, if small, but F&B here is terrible, the food was bad or not available, and they tried to substitute Prosecco in place of Champagne, yet charge for Champagne. The buffet breakfast was old stale food that was out to get cold, so do not bother paying for that. The rooms are also very noisy, as the hotel seems to have a problem with its plumbing, they did provide ear plugs, but it does not make for a comfortable nights sleep

title: Great pool and location
desc: The overall stay was very nice. The staff are very kind and efficient and accommodating for any of your needs. The hotel was clean and the room had very comfortable beds, nice showers and air conditioned perfectly. Often times, rooms are freezing but they found the balance here. A couple things could be worked on however. I would wake up very early and often there was not staff at the front desk. I had some queries on where to go, where to find things and no one was there. There is no onsite restaurant. Breakfast was catered in and didn't start until 8 AM which was too late for me. The lobby was often hot. They threw open the front glass doors to get fresh air in but even at 7AM it was uncomfortable. There is no bar staff at the roof pool bar. You have to call

title: Awful Service
desc: Awful service - impolite and unhelpful throughout our stay. No hot water in the room. No response to an email request sent over a week ahead of the stay. Breakfast was small and low quality. Naumi purports to be a "luxury boutique hotel", but our experience was that of a low-quality, cheap bed-and-breakfast. Don't pay more than $100 (including breakfast) for your stay. Disappointing.

title: Stylish, modern hotel with comfortable beds and friendly staff
desc: I really enjoyed my stay. The hotel was so comfortable, I enjoyed the hotel's style and elegance. My bed was comfortable and room was well designed. The staff were friendly and provided excellent service. It was in a great location, close to Raffles City and some great restaurants and cafes. A favourite for me in Singapore.

title: Great Hotel, Great Staff
desc: I stayed at Naumi for 2 weeks on a business trip and my stay was fantastic. Great hotel, pool, service and above staff that could not do enough for me. Highly recommended for business or pleasure anytime of year!

title: 2D1N stay at Naumi Hotel
desc: Hotel gave us complimentary upgrade to our room. Room came with bathtub and huge toilet. They also provide us complimentary drinks (Coke, Sprite, Ginger Ale) and snacks (Truffle Chips and nuts). The bar also came with a coffee machine. Room was clean, bed was comfortable. Highly recommended.

title: Best Staff Ever
desc: You will never be disappointed staying in this hotel. The staff ensure that all your needs and requirements are well taken care of. The location is great and a good base to explore Singapore's main attraction. The view from the pool is to die for. It feels like checking into a home, not a hotel. That's how great they are.

title: 100% recommended
desc: Very pleasant stay! The staffs were great and the stay was very nice, the rooms are really nice and spacious. The pool is great too with a mini bar section. My favourite part is the check in as it was really smooth. Unlike other hotels this was a very fast check in and the staffs were really friendly.

title: as described earlier
desc: Breakfast too late, should be 7 am not a lot of choices for breakfast and only one coffee for free No service at the roof top Long waiting to get served at the bar I am client since 13 years and had never such a poor service

title: Good location, but the room is not user friendly enough
desc: this room is not value for money. the design of the room makes it looks very small. Overall the room is not user friendly. The snack bar is not easy to use. After i take the shower, i find out that the water has spread to the room and i shall dry myself...

title: Fantastic experience
desc: It is one of the best hotel that I have ever stayed. Their hospitality is awesome and the room is not small. The location is centralise and great to explore the nearby bugis, suntec and city hall area. It is also quiet.

title: Very nice hotel with great location.
desc: I stayed here for a week during a business trip. Staff was helpful. The room was clean and spacious. The pillows were a little too big for my liking but everything else was fine. It was in a great location to go around.

title: Probably not worth the price
desc: Friendly staff. Good location. 2 lifts for the whole hotel which meanst you had to wait a little. Overall cleanliness of the room could be improved. Walls were thin and you could hear footsteps clearly.

title: Fabulous Hotel in great location
desc: Amazing hotel in a fabulous location, literally next to Raffles and 5 mins walk to Raffles City shopping centre which has an M&S food hall! The staff at the hotel were really friendly & very helpful, organising Uber taxis for us as cheapest way to get around. Taxis are the only cheap thing in Singapore! The rooftop pool is fabulous & must have one of the best views in the city, a gorgeous relaxing deck to lounge about on after a hot day sightseeing. Rooms really nice & contain everything you need including nespresso machine, ironing board, dressing gown/slippers for the pool! A great stay thank you Naumi.

title: Anniversary Staycation
desc: Given the room at very low floor, and the appearance of it now enticing. The room was facing alley at very low floor , outside easily look into the room. I have put do not disturb but still receive 2 calls to confirm whether to do housekeeping. which is irritating

title: worth the stay
desc: the hotel is super cosy, the vicinity of the area has good food too. check in was fast and the staff by the name of Tinesh who is friendly and helpful throughout my stay with enquiries and ideas. thank you will surely be back with friends and recommend them this hotel.

title: Great service and location
desc: I chose this hotel because it is quickly accessed from the airport but I was also pleasantly surprised at how excellent the service was. Very nice quiet and comfortable rooms too. Easy to access the train in the morning.

title: Review
desc: I went here with family based on their location near to public area, but the room is quite small, staffs not friendly and helpful, i asked for changes the sheets bed but they don’t changed and the checkout time on 11. It’s actually not an ideal time

title: Bad experience at Naumi Hotel
desc: As it was a birthday celebration, my friend sent flowers as a surprise. Flowers arrived at about 8pm at the hotel recept, and as per informed by Naumi, the delivery man told them that the receiver knows about it. Naumi decided there wasn’t a need to inform me. I think this is acceptable. however, what’s not is that, I checked out the next morning, 11am and they didn’t inform me about it at all. It was only till night time 7pm when they called to inform me about the flowers. they then expected me to travel back to the hotel to collect back my flowers, even suggested that they can keep till i am available to collect, when flowers are perishable. It was only after several rounds of negotiation before they agreed to send the flowers over. Felt that service could have been better!

title: Enjoyable staycation
desc: Generally, I enjoyed my stay at Naumi Hotel. It will be better if the staff was more attentive (checked in one day before my birthday but staff was unaware). Satellite Tv quality too blurry, technician could not resolve it.

title: Unforgettable experience!
desc: My partner and I would like to offer our sincerest gratitude to the entire team at Naumi. This was our first time staying there but definitely not the last. Shoutout to their manager, Tinesh, for being extremely accommodating. We were allowed to check out late as I was not feeling well. Thank you and we will be back soon.

title: A boutique hotel (as described)
desc: The hotel was surprisingly good, but needs a few adjustments and would be great. Breakfast is probably q bit over priced for what you get and from memory doesn't start until 8am, which is hard if you have kids who wake early. Room was nice and I found the bedding excellent. Would I stay again, probably not with children, however as a couple or solo then a yes!

title: One night
desc: The quality of this hotel is really good, pool on rooftop is a great bonus. The room is clean, nice and modern with all stuff. The only downside for me is the soundproofing, but not enought to degrade the review.

title: trendy rooms not our style unfortunately
desc: Great trendy hotel, but really our room was really only suitable for 1 guest. It was very squeezy with 2 medium sized suitcases. And also the open bathroom concept is not really to our liking (I like my privacy). Thought the small room wouldn't be an issue as each room has a courtyard, however, it was not pleasant to sit in as it seemed more like an enclosed box, rather claustrophobic, due to the height of the walls for privacy. There was a lovely rooftop bar with infinity pool (not heated unfortunately). Breakfast was also very basic. I think this type of hotel is more suited for the younger guest, being a little more mature I like space and plusher surroundings.

title: Brilliant city stay in Singapore!
desc: This property exceeded our expectations. It was great value for money compared to other similar hotels priced way higher. Loved the location and the staff were friendly. We were very happy to arrive into a clean room after some prior travel delays.

title: Perfectly located Hotel
desc: This hotel was in a wonderful location. It was right across the street from the Raffles Hotel. There were many good places to eat & grab a drink right next to the hotel. The staff was friendly and very accommodating. The pool was amazing! The view was spectacular and it was never crowded when we where there (end of August). The AC worked very well in our room which we appreciated.

title: Incredible service, convenient location (must book!)
desc: It was my first time in Singapore and Naumi hotel checked all the boxes for service, location, amenities, and aesthetics. SERVICE From the moment we arrived, Farah, Assistant Hotel Services Manager, has been kind and attentive. She made sure we had the best stay by providing us with directions, and recommendations (ex. money exchange), even allowing us to late check out (12 PM). We even got our PCR test printed for free after we checked out. This is why the service was top-notch: I will never forget how the entire front desk team helped me find my "lost" AirPods. Even when Housekeeping (cleaner and manager) confirmed it was not in the room, another Services staff personally went up to our room to search for it and found it! I was close to tears so, THANK YOU to the team

title: An excellent place to view the National Day fireworks
desc: Naumi hotel has all the quirky touches a boutique hotel needs to differentiate itself from other hotels. Besides being an excellent place to view the National Day fireworks and the various helicopter flypasts, their rooftop bar and pool offer a tranquil sanctuary from the city's bustle. The overall service was personal, warm, and small gestures - such as offering the Naumi hippos as gifts to my kids - definitely made our stay memorable.

title: Wonderful Short Stay
desc: Stayed at Naumi Hotel with my son for 2 nights. The location was perfect, nearby Raffles City and Burgis. The staff were very helpful and friendly. We were even able to leave our bags and use the rooftop pool after check-out, which was great since our flight was not til the evening. It is more for couples though, but my son still enjoyed himself. The breakfast was alright.

title: Beautiful Hotel
desc: We have recently stayed at this hotel and it did not disappoint, amazing decor with an unbelievable pool the only disappointment was the size of the room, we booked a room for 2 adults and 1 child (aged 12) with 1 bed to share. rooms are only suitable for 2 adults max. overall a very good experience.

title: Nice boutique hotel
desc: Stayed here through dayuse during the National Day holiday. Enjoyed the scenic Singapore skyline and fireworks from the al fresco bar on the 10th floor. Staff were polite, joyful and courteous though the food took a long time to arrive, it seems like we were forgotten until I asked the staff about our order. Room was big and spacious but the corridors are quite dark due to the dark coloured walls. Overall we did enjoy our short stay and would come again if the price is right.

title: Not a 5 star hotel
desc: The pictures are nice but in reality the room is dated. The tv screen is wonky and the keycard holders is recycled. Definitely not a 5 star hotel as proclaimed. However, the staff is friendly and helpful.

title: Don’t feel like 5 Star Luxury Hotel
desc: Not convenient to do business as there is no bidet in the toilet. Also book this hotel for National Day and last minute receive email saying that we have to pay $70+ for roof top access with cocktail and bar bites after spending so much on 3D2N.

title: Will be back
desc: Excellent hotel in a great location. Management & staff were amazing. Will miss the view from the pool. We’d start the day with a swim and finish the day with a swim and something from the bar. Special thanks to Angie who was always a smiling helpful face and made our stay a breeze.

title: Good location, friendly staff
desc: Location of the hotel is great, only 10 mins from bugis MRT station, it is easy to go to most of the places like Chinatown, little India, raffle place. And there is some pubs nearby, if want to chill out in the night with friend, it is easy to find a place.

title: Excellent!
desc: Excellent hotel! Very friendly staff, super clean facilities and great location. Central but quiet. Very stylish . We will certainly be coming back! We felt very welcomed and everyone was extremely helpful. Thank you!

title: Disappointment When You Have Big Expectations
desc: What you see may not be what you get. Make sure you ask for the actual room layout for your selection, as the Oasis room comes in many configurations - some are nicer than the rest. Also, take note that the check-out is at 11am and they are inflexible about it.

title: Small but perfect.
desc: We ended our 2 week south East Asian trip with 3 nights here. It’s situated in a very convenient area for walking the city. Our room was fabulous. (We we’re upgraded!) Clean, tidy, spacious and with lovely toiletries. Comfy bed. The restaurant attached was good and breakfast more than we needed. It’s worth just popping in to meet the ladies and gentlemen on reception! Always ready to help, chat and joke with! The last evening we watched members of the Red Bull F1 team arrive! An added interest! If we are ever lucky enough to come back to Singapore this is where we be staying just to meet the lovely reception team again!

title: Sad early morning
desc: You have not even checked in yet, after 13 hours flight (tired and sleepless) but you have already been told to pay on top - early arrival - not included breakfast - explained you have to pay additional cleaning min you got sick of Covid. Guys, have you heart anything about hospitality and experience? It’s written small luxury hotels of the world - on your wall, but the impression of 3* low level. I don’t mind to pay, but when it’s packaged as “taking care” of me as a client, not that every step is a rule ;( very sad the first 10 mints early morning. That experience don’t make me to come back again

title: Great location, but time for an upgrade
desc: Great located hotel, but the hotel has lost its cool and edge. The Staff should be more professional, Room and restaurant needs a facelift. Better food option align with today’s travellers need, Maumi you can better!

title: Naumi Hotel
desc: Naumi Hotel is an all in one great experience of Singapore & Asia! From the Location to the excellence of their friendly staff! I recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Singapore! The location, the strip of Bars & Coffee shops just outside the hotel’s front door! It’s the ideal spot

title: A wonderful stay
desc: Was travelling with my girlfriend and decided to do my Marriage Proposal in Singapore. After scouting for various hotel in Singapore, I came across Naumi Hotel and their room photo on booking.com caught my attention. Decided to give them a call and discuss with them about making my Marriage Proposal happen. The staffs were very friendly and welcoming. They have been very helpful in assisting me to received my room decoration stuff and flowers bouquet on behalf and got them set up in my room. Everything is perfectly done according to what I want and I strongly recommend this hotel. Special thanks to Ms Farah and her team for making our stay a memorable one. In terms of room facility, everything is good and the bed is comfortable. There are many hidden surprise in the room

title: Fantastic stay at Naumi Hotel
desc: Short but fantastic stay at Naumi Hotel. Great location (right next to Raffles) - very nice rooms and helpful staff. Make sure to check out the 10th floor bar deck and infinity pool with great views!!

title: Best spot to stay in Singapore
desc: The Naumi hotel has been amazing, the rooms are extremely comfortable equipped with everything you need and the water is changed daily in your room. The pool is so refreshing with the best view. Thanks to Rayan who really made us feel welcome even when checking out. It is a must stay as it located within the heart of Singapore, it’s easy to access everything and I can’t wait to stay here next time we’re in Singapore.

title: Good location with pool
desc: Friendly staff and good location. It’s located between City Hall and Bugis MRT which makes it a great location for convenience. Infinity pool was nice to use with good views. Personally thought the room was a bit too dark even with all the lights on and I wasn’t able to find a bin in the room besides the bathroom bin. There’s a connecting restaurant downstairs as well as quite a few pubs/bars on the street which can get noisy on weekends. The rooms are quite soundproof though and you can’t hear much noise otherwise.

title: Breakfast n room not value for money. Location and staff are great though.
desc: Many improvements the housekeeping and breakfast team can do. Tap with bad flow n shooting water onto floor n on our shoes, auto blinds & curtains very dusty, face towels missing, pool bar no service or directions, not very desirable breakfast menu n food is not warm enough.

title: Amazing Day Stay at Naumi Hotel
desc: We booked at Naumi hotel through Dayuse for our 18 hours daytime transit in Singapore. Our original booking was for 10am but the hotel let us check-in earlier as soon as the room became available. We love the hotel location, the design and the rooftop pool. The highlight of our stay is the lovely staff and the customer service: Farah, the Assistant Manager, was very lovely, warm and helpful throughout our stay. We will be back the next time we are in Singapore.

title: Warm and cozy
desc: Overall excellent. The hotel is warm and cozy, the room is newly decorate with basic amenities and also free minibar. Small pool is on the rooftop with good and chill city view. The staff also very nice and helpful.

title: Excellent Location
desc: I cannot fault the staff here; they went above and beyond for my wife and I at all times. There were very accommodating and knowledgeable. The hotel is eclectic and modern but is in need of a refresh, but you can't beat the location.

title: This hotel was great
desc: Good location , Excellent rooms and the rooftop bar and infintiy pool were just what was needed after a long day at work. The Tess bar/restaurant next door was really good too. i am already recommending it to friends and family.

title: Comfortable centric hotel boutique
desc: At the end of October 2022 we stayed in this nice hotel boutique with beautiful roof swimming pool. For Singapore standards good room size. Conveniently located, very clean and with kind service team. Correct breakfast & good wifi

title: No go. You can do better.
desc: Not worth it for the price you pay. I paid around 490 sgd for one night and this is just a boutique hotel. However the price did not deter me when I made the booking as I thought that smaller hotels like this would be special and might be a jem. Definitely not though. The room is tiny and not well maintained. The towels are thin and cheap material, with holes. Extremely disgusted with the condition. No view at all even if you request for a high floor. Don't expect much of a service as well. It's mediocre. Please also note that check out time is 11am and late check is 1130. When I did ask the receptionist on why the check out timing is so early, she mentioned that they are a small hotel with not much manpower so they need more time to clean the rooms. People are coming over for a

title: Nice design Hotel at good location, but continuously getting more and more worn out
desc: Nice hotel with originally very nice facilities. In the meantime, however, the house is starting to show its age and wear and tear. Breakfast is only made available very late in the morning and is unfortunately usually not ready at the specified time. Unfortunately, the breakfast itself is very limited and there is e.g. unfortunately no cold cuts for the bread.

title: Incredible Stay
desc: I've stayed at a few luxury hotels in Singapore, but in terms of service I don't think anywhere has been better than Naumi. Incredibly helpful staff and a really enjoyable stay. Will definitely stay here again in the future.

title: excellent！
desc: + Comfortable bed + Complementary mini bar （soft drinks) + Good location + Great view from cute rooftop infinity pool + The friendliest staffs! All the team at Naumi were incredibly friendly and helpful.

title: Stay at naumi hotel
desc: Mentioned in my review earlier on that due to my room being in the second floor we could hear a lot of noise coming from the ground floor especially on Friday night. I could not sleep until 3am because the noise could be heard from my room

title: Chic. Comfy bed. Staff A+
desc: Staff really helpful at all times. Nothing too much for them. Hotel in great location. 5 minute walk to Merlion for example. Rooftop pool v nice. Room on small side. We weren't sure where to put our bags and clothes. Bed was exquisite. Total comfort. Best bed we've ever slept in!

title: So expensive. I expected more
desc: So expensive. I expected more, No bidet, glass has stains, doesnt meet my expectation for a 5 star hotel, far to the mrt stations about 500-650 meters. room is small. Breakfast is very simple inspite of its price. Terrible :(

title: Nice pictures but avoid if you can
desc: Room was not clean, stains on the walls and phone very dirty. I asked the front desk to fix it, nothing done. Mattress is way too firm, and room (201) very noisy with loud music from the lobby just one level down. I will definitely not come back, other options nearby are better choices.

title: Handy location
desc: We had booked two rooms and requested rooms must be interconnected as we were traveling with kids. On arrival late afternoon only 1 of the room was ready so we checked in one and the other room was ready around 9pm. We didn’t have any issues through out our stay. Rooms layout a bit odd but in Singapore you can’t expect huge rooms generally speaking. If you want good size room you get a suite. We didn’t get breakfast as we know there is always good eats near by. Staff very nice and helpful. Room top pool bar a must go, breath taking views at night.

title: Instagramable and chic
desc: A very well designed space and pleasent scent invited us the moment we stepped in. The room has a coco chanel inspired design that is very unique and one of the "wow" rooms we have experienced so far. Details well loved and space is inviting with hints of the brand in every corner.

title: Amazing Stay
desc: They were able to check me in early, which in itself was amazing! The room was lovely and I enjoyed every minute of my stay! Location was very convenient with lots of restaurants near by! The walk to the Metro was a short (less than 10mins) and a large shopping center about the same distance.

title: Cool respite in the heart of the City
desc: Ideal location just 3min from City Hall MRT. Lots of eateries on the same street & down the road. The Naumi team is warm, friendly and out to please. The rooms are designed in a modern fashion with clever & quirky teasers. Local snacks, bathtub & ultra comfortable bed & pillows awaited us at the Oasis room. The infinity pool at the rooftop is legendary with its stunning skyline view. With the reopening of the bar, this is the perfect place to chill & hangout.

title: Great location!
desc: This was my first time to stay at a hotel highly recommended by my husband. Great location near Raffles. We received king bed in room that offered queen and king options - yay! We didn’t dine at the property during our short visit. Appreciated the link on their website for local attractions. Room on street and heard noise from taco bar next door until early morning hours - weeknights and weekend.

title: great location
desc: Very impressed with location. Staff were very friendly and helpful and the room was clean. Room was a little smaller than we thought. Room for the size was a little pricey but to be expected as Singapore is a very expensive city.

title: Lovely hotel
desc: We stayed at the Naumi in November. Loved the hotel and its location. Beautiful roof top bar and swimming pool. If only there had been a Barman. Staff very helpful. Would only stay here when visiting again. Can’t fault anything. Thank you 😊

title: Below average and poor value and average facilities
desc: Great location poor service, poor facilities, overprice Gym was like a closet, food was very ordinary. Staff where unhelpful. The room media was terrible - I also felt that for the cost of the room you would have more quality across the entire experience

title: Value for money
desc: Managed to check in early thanks to very friendly staff. Special room allocation for our baby too. The location was very close to (walking distance) raffles city mall and marina bay centre. Very convenient all around

title: Just what we needed
desc: Well located and within walking distance of an MRT station, across from Raffles (if you fancy visiting the Long Bar) and a short walk to Arab Street area. Clean room and lobby area. Water available on arrival. Friendly staff and quiet room. Huge bathroom and separate toilet.

title: Cozy boutique at a great location
desc: Stayed here for a business trip, very happy with the experience. Fast wifi, comfortable bed, great shower set up. Room was cozy and felt spacious. Staff was very friendly and courteous. Gym facilities a bit basic but very convenient. I didn’t get to check out the pool but maybe next time. Definitely would recommend in terms of location. Very close to a lot of nearby hotels and conference centers. Food choices nearby also not bad, plenty of cool bars. 10/10 would do again

title: Lovely and Quiet
desc: Beautiful small boutique hotel located close to shops, MRT and busses. While the room itself is showing some signs of age, the place is still kept spotless. Friendly and helpful staff. Location wise, a short walk away (depending on the direction you're headed towards) will lead you to Bugis MRT, City Hall, and Esplanade. Excellent location, very quiet.

title: Good for Insta-worthy photos and its aesthetics, but nothing much to do.
desc: We stayed at room 305. Initially we had a hard time locating the hotel as it was in between buildings and it is a small boutique hotel. Check-in staff were unfriendly and robotic, as there was hardly any communication, we were shoved the room keys quickly. The whole corridor to the rooms was unlit, and we only found our room after noticing that the room numbers are on the floor instead of at the door. Room is a bit small, but is clean and neat with modern furnishings and decor. Swimming pool is a bit too small, and the gyms are spread into 3 floors, 1 room each depending on the types of exercise that you want. Walking distance to shopping centres such as Bugis Junction or Raffles City Shopping Centre, but for those not familiar with the place, might find it quite a distance

title: Nice Room
desc: We had a short stay at Naumi. The room is beautiful and clean. Breakfast could be better, I expected a bigger, nicer buffet, but this was my expectation. The pool at the top is also a nice experience. The pizza at the hotel restaurant is very good.

title: 4 star at best
desc: Stayed in Naumi over NYE. Singapore is extremely pricey over that weekend and so was the Naumi. Location is great and so is the pool area. However the initial service we got was really poor. The first room we were given did also smell smoke. Then management really compensated us by upgrading the room category. And they really tried to make us feel comfortable. Cred to the managers that handeled us but...nevertheless, I must say that Naumi SIngapore is at best a 4 star hotel. The breakfsast is even worse than you get in a two star hotel in Europe. And the pool bar was unmanned even under peak season. The feeling you get when entering the lobby is far from 5 star. Sorry to say!

title: Fun stay!
desc: We really enjoyed our stay at Naumi! The best part was the modern room, filtered water and Nespresso machine. From the reviews I read I thought there was going to be rooftop restaurant but that is not the case, the restaurant is on the first floor by the lobby. I like the boutique size of this place, there was never a wait any any concerns were addressed immediately. The location is perfect, right by the Raffles Hotel, tons of great food and a short 20 minute walk to the main waterfront area. Def splurge for a corner room or room with a view if you can. A lot of the rooms face a not so cute building across the street.

title: Naumi Hotel Singapore
desc: Service was impeccable. Staff was courteous and friendly and very very helpful. Me and my family got to enjoy our vacation. Location was great too! If am to come back, i would definitely book the same hotel. Restaurants and malls are just a quick walk. Just please improve your breakfast food.

title: recommended place to stay and relax, the swimming pool is much more added an attraction to this hotel,nice & great view.
desc: recommended place to stay and relax, the swimming pool is much more added an attraction to this hotel,nice & great view.The room is clean.We had our great time during our stay, and so thankful to the staff attend to us on the new year's eve for being so polite and helpful to us to get a resevation to the swimming pool on the new year 2023 countdown.Thanks again.

title: Great Services & Kind Staffs
desc: Services from the staffs were the best, especially from Farah, her kind gesture to us really warmed my heart, she surprised my youngest and even sang the birthday song which is not what other hotels would usually do. I definitely will come back to naumi if I visit singapore again. Thank you to all staffs for being so kind towards my family and I

title: pleasant stay
desc: The hotel staffs were all very friendly and very patient with my requests. The bed was really comfy and the location of the hotel is within walking distance to nearby shopping malls which is very convenient

title: Perfect hideaway
desc: Naumi Hotel is my kind of place, a reverie. The rate was pricey, I wish it included breakfast. Anyway, it is a cozy hotel where we were able to relax and bond as a family with my teenage kids. The lobby is a place to unwind so is the beautiful rooftop outlet. We only tried the margherita but based on what I saw, the other dishes are inviting. It is a perfect hideaway for couples. Not to forget, the lady who welcomed us last Dec 16 was sincere and heartfelt

title: It was a pleasant getaway
desc: The room air-condition was superb, and sleep was great as the bed was comfy. They provided bolster which we really liked. The pool had a very nice view of the central business district. The location was within walking distance to all the dining and shopping.

title: One of the best hotels in sg
desc: Third visit to Naumi. Staff are very friendly, check in was prompt and location is prime. Previously visited before covid but nothing has changed since in terms of quality. A real luxury boutique hotel.

title: Exelent
desc: Great hotel,location,cleanliness ,food and staff!I have no complaints!It’s close to everything,just walk distance,rooms are very clean and comfortable and i really recommend the hotels restaurant,Marcelo does a great job!

title: Still my number 1 Hotel in Singapore
desc: I have been visiting Singapore once a year for one week for business for several years and I always stay at this hotel. The location is ideal and the rooftop pool is amazing. Understandably, a lot has changed since the pandemic and there is room for improvement concerning the breakfast offering. However, what has stayed the same is the exceptional level of customer service. The team are a friendly, professional and knowledgeable group of hardworking individuals and this has been demonstrated through the multiple interactions I have had with them during my recent stay. Notably, I would like to acknowledge Vincent for his leadership and support over the past week. It has been a pleasure returning to Singapore for work after the pandemic and an absolutely joy meeting familiar and

title: Love this small luxury hotel!
desc: Superb hotel and location! Well-designed and cozy room, great amenities like the gym and rooftop lap pool, awesome in-house Italian restaurant. Loads of good food nearby too, such as chicken rice, tacos, French crepe, scissors-cut rice, etc. Would love to come back here again:)

title: Quick staycation
desc: This hotel was new to us but chose it due to its proximity to City Hall area. Was surprised to find it neat and posh. We like the vanity sink island setup and the hidden bar is also unique. Would love to book a weekend again.

title: Tip Top
desc: Comfortable and enjoyed the stay. Location was perfect to go anywhere! Room decked in comfortable bed and pillows. Amenanties were all there with complimentary 1st round bar. but the tv was dated with grainy screen.

title: Not worthy
desc: Special requests were not answered/attended/informed. Don’t have that kind of 5 stars services. Late checkout also have to call up the front desk to check the availability and the staff is not willing to confirm whether can check out late upon registration. It does not make any sense when this request has been sent at the point of booking. Apparently, there was nobody reading or taking the special requests.

title: Extraordinary hospitality
desc: The Naumi hotel, located in a central position to everything, is excellent for any stay. The rooms are spotlessly clean and comfortable. The rooftop swimming pool offers paranoiac views of the city. I like to share my experience of dropping my gold wedding ring over the rooftop pool, and the staff managed to find it even after we gave up on searching after a few hours. I highly recommend this hotel to anyone who wants to walk and explore Singapore. Most taxis will refuse to enter the CDB even if you offer them extra to hire because of heavy traffic, and you won't regret having a hotel centrally located. Naomi's team is exceptional and I am pretty sure they will make the best of your stay at the hotel.

title: Terrific... Ossum
desc: This hotel was like our own little slice of heaven. It was precisely what we envisioned for our week-long getaway. The food and service were impeccable, and there were all sorts of cool things to do nearby.

title: A pleasant under-stated little hotel
desc: A nice understated hotel close to Raffles. We came for 3 nights to acclimatise before heading on to Vietnam. Didn't include breakfast as we knew we'd be waking up at odd times and this turned out to be a wise move. We walked downtown every morning and explored the city instead. The room was big and well served with everything we needed. When we were already on our way to the airport I got a message from the reception saying I'd left all my jewellry next to the bed. This included my wedding ring, engagement ring and other bits with huge sentimental value. I was horrified and asked if they would courier it to my London address which they did. I checked in with them regularly and they supplied tracking information and kept an eye on it until the parcel arrived. Couldn't have asked

title: Dreamy honeymoon spot
