desc: Dreamy honeymoon spot. My husband and I spent our honeymoon at Naumi. Everything was absolutely perfect. The views from the rooftop pool were stunning and romantic. We loved every moment we spent there.

title: Attentive staff , great location, great fireworks viewing
desc: We had 7 nights stay and whilst there was a hiccup on the first night of a room type we had booked, the staff were very responsive and helpful to sort it out for our Mum for her special stay. Room attendance re cleanliness was great, felt very comfortable here. Location is so convenient . Staff are so cheerful and friendly and discreet in caring for us! We Will return for another stay.

title: Singapore comfort
desc: Lovely boutique hotel, great location. Excellent staff, efficient and friendly. Close to museums, restaurants and parks. Great location if you want to see large parts of Singapore on foot. Lovely rooftop infinity pool area if you want to just relax.

title: Lovely room overshadowed by the FANTASTIC staff!
desc: Our trip didn’t start off great - the airline lost our luggage. However not only was the hotel in a great location and was exactly as advertised, the staff blew us away. They all went the extra mile to ensure our stay was as good as possible considering the annoying circumstances of having no luggage. The location is so convenient for the major sightseeing attractions of Singapore, as well as being within close proximity of several shopping malls, and is a reasonable to and from the airport on the subway too. Would stay again - thanks to the staff for making our stay great. Oh, and the rooftop pool and decking area is lovely.

title: Sold as „best of the best“ - really not….
desc: Definitely not Tripadvisor „Best of the best“! But first, the good things: 1. Early check in was no problem - very much appreciated! 2. Location in the centre is awesome. 3. Design of the Hotel is not bad. 4. Pool on the terrace is great. The bad things: 1. Hotel is average clean. 2. Hotel is outworn and clearly needs some refit. 3. Gym: The pics of the gym and the reality differs: Reality: Super small and really sticky machines (less than average clean). I truly don‘t understand why there are never, really never, even if you ask, towels. And also not as shown on the pics: There are no water bottles!

title: A great boutique hotel
desc: I stayed for 6 nights at Naumi for a business trip. The hotel is amazingly located next to many restaurants and shops. The staff was great (shoutout to Lim from housekeeping, such a helpful, efficient and friendly lady!) and helped me whenever I needed something. The room was very well arranged, pillows were comfy, and the amenity kit contained all that I needed. The rooftop pool and bar is awesome, you have such an incredible view to the skyline. I would definitely book the hotel again!

title: Not worth the price
desc: I chose this hotel because it is about 10 minutes walking distance to City Hall mrt station. It is quite. But you need to help yourself with luggages as there are no doorman there to help you. No breakfast provided. A bit pricey for the service. No coming back.

title: Good but can be better
desc: Overall experience is good but can be better. no carpark within the hotel and has issue with parking. room is clean and provide cold drinking water. bed is huge and good. Bathtub is good but has to wait very long for hot running water.

title: Literally the best BED I've stayed on my travel life
desc: I've traveled for business and Leisure many times. Beds usually suck, that's a fact. What a nice surprise to see Naumi not only offers a great room, at a great location for a fair price, but they also go fantastic beds!

title: Boutique hotel in central location.
desc: The Naumi is well located, central to marina Bay, Raffles etc but tucked away in a side street so very quiet. The staff are very friendly and helpful. The rooms are quite funky but comfortable. I was a little worried at the clear glass door on the toilet but relieved to discover it was magic glass - a flick of a switch and the glass became opaque. This was our second visit and it was just as we remembered it. Will definitely recommend to friends.

title: Lovely Boutique Hotel in Singapore
desc: Naomi Hotel is located in-between Bugis and Raffles City with easy walking distance to either or to public transport. The staff was super friendly and amenities very nice. Highly recommend a stay here!

title: Fantastic stay and friendly Staff
desc: Our stay was absolutely lovely, we were well looked after, breakfast was absolutely delicious even though it wasn't a huge menu it was perfect especially the scrambled eggs. The pool with its amazing view and the extras that the hotel included really made it worth while staying. Would definitely stay there again. The Guest Relations Manager was absolutely beautiful and really looked after us. A1

title: Great boutique hotel in a great location
desc: Rooms are very comfortable and well designed and modern, very helpful staff. Location is very close to the business center of Singapore but also Orchard Road, Raffles, and other areas of interest, MRT station nearby.

title: One of the best hotel experiences I have had! I recommend Naomi Hotel.
desc: The service was impeccable! The GM Ms. Koay and staff was unbelievably courteous and helpful. I asked her for advice on a what gift I could buy my 5 year old daughter. She not only recommend a perfect gift, she picked it up for me and delivered it wrapped. Then I needed a late checkout and she extended the time more than any hotel ever had let me do before by far. This hotel is extremely clean and uniquely artistic. They also have an amazing pool overlooking the city. I will be back! Thank you Ms. Koay!

title: A very personal experience
desc: Great location and a warm and friendly atmosphere. The staff are all focused on being helpful and the greatest asset of this hotel. Rooms are compact but comfortable and practically designed, with sufficient storage space for personal effects.

title: Well located, comfortable hotel with excellent staff.
desc: Clean and comfortable. Excellent staff - really pleasant and obliging. Great views from the pool bar. Food good and good service in the restaurant. Outside front bar to watch people in comfort. Very near Raffles and Tess next door. Great location for lots of things.

title: Gorgeous!
desc: I'm glad to hear that you had a positive experience at a beautiful hotel with a great location and a lovely pool. It's always nice to find a hotel that meets your expectations and has amenities that you enjoy.

title: Good experience
desc: The staff is super friendly and helpful. The room is comfortable. But towel hygiene shall be improved. We reported the smell of towel in the first day. Hotel change towel for us immediately. But the towels replaced by house keeping team shows the same hygiene issue.

title: Great boutique hotel
desc: Naumi hotel is a great place to stay in Singapore. Location wise is perfect and the room was so beautiful and during Valentine's day they left me roses and petals in my bed with some sweets too. I would definitely recommend you to stay there.

title: High spec interior
desc: This was just a one night stay in the hotel. The staff were very friendly and helpful. The room and surrounding areas were furnished to a high standard and perfectly clean. Some interesting storage solutions. The roof top area and pool were relaxing with great views. I would recommend this hotel to anyone. Unfortunately, I did not get chance to eat here, due to other commitments.

title: Great experience.
desc: I would highly recommend this hotel. We certainly found just what we were looking for at Naumi. Would we stay there again? Would we recommend it to friends or family? Most definitely! I loved it very much

title: Kind staff and amazing hotel
desc: The hotel is very nice, cosy with clean and comfortable rooms. Great pool on the roof and amazing complimentary services. Most of all we appreciated the kindness, sweetness and extreme professionalism of the staff. Will come back for sure! Thank you Naumi!

title: Hair and lint on bed and dovet cover
desc: Me and my partner we celebrated our anniversary here and we were expecting a nice and clean room but what we got was a bed with lint and hair.was the opposite of what I expected since they pride themself as a luxurious hotel

title: Short and Sweet Trip
desc: Hotel very close to the subway as well as all the local eatery around the premises. Fantastic service, clean and comfortable room. Amazing rooftop pool which you can unwind yourself. Happy hour at the small lounge which is very nice touch! We have a great stay and will be back!

title: Amazing roof top pool
desc: Lots of little extras made this a really nice stay in Singapore. Loved the bath and supply of bath salts, plus complementary mini bar. The roof top pool and sitting area was amazing. Our room was on the 8th floor and it was very quiet. Lots of interesting art work about the hotel too!

title: Nice rooms, nice location but poor service
desc: Great spot, nice modern rooms but let down by some staff that have very little idea on customer service. Breakfast buffet from 7am but the single staff member preparing it shows up at 7.15 and the hot food was not available at 7.45. The night before we checked out we booked an airport taxi and someone to help with our luggage. Nobody arrived to help with the luggage and the taxi driver came into the lobby to assist. The reception desk was empty and we had to call to find someone to check us out. Could be a great hotel but not there yet

title: Best and helpful staff
desc: Nice and clean room. So many hidden compartments in the room but shown by the well-trained staff while bringing up my baggage. Walking distance to subway station which is big plus for me as I prefer to travel by public transport. You will always be greeted by the reception staff when walk into the hotel lobby. Love the hotel and cannot recommend it highly enough.

title: Lovely Hotel with friendly Staff in the middle of the places to be
desc: Nice and cozy hotel. Rooms are new, clean and all whats needed is in place. Area around offers a lot attractions and all relevant Spots to see are close. Hotel Team is great and the Pool have a lovely view towards the City.

title: Best Boutique Hotel in Singapore
desc: This was my fifth stay at Naumi and there’s a reason I keep coming back. Great staff, great location, great rooms and awesome rooftop infinity pool. Felt more like a holiday than a business trip. I’ll keep coming back!

title: Friendly, clean, beautiful room, amazing pool, cool artwork
desc: I am so glad I stayed here! Staff went above my expectations for friendliness and helpfulness. The location is excellent, close to sights and places to enjoy an amazing cup of coffee, a good beer with tapas, or the must-try Singapore chicken rice. The room was clean, modern and beautiful. New bed mattress, quiet and also had an electric rolling blind sun screen for the window so the room could be darkened for a good sleep. I would welcome another opportunity to stay at Naumi Singapore!

title: Great location, helpful and friendly staff
desc: Stayed 5 nights on way back to Switzerland and really enjoyed it. Great central location. Well planned rooms. Super rooftop pool area. Breakfast unspectacular but there are loads of restaurants in the area.

title: Friendly staff and good location
desc: We were warmly welcomed upon arrival, and appreciated the personal follow up from the staff. Great location. Great decorations/art in the reception and on the roof terrace, which gave the hotel a personal touch. We enjoyed the pool and the fantastic view from the roof terrace.

title: Wonderful little hotel in great location
desc: Hotel and the staff are wonderful. I arrived at the hotel at 11:00 hrs (check in is at 15:00) however the room was ready. I was told that if it hadn't been, then I could use the facilities like showers etc. and they would store my luggage until the room was ready. Breakfast has a limited selection, but it was fine just to grab something before to leave to explore the city. Staff were very helpful and friendly. The Room was nice and clean. There is a complimentary mini fridge that was stocked with some cans of sparkling water, water and a chocolate bar which was a nice surprise. There is a kettle and coffee maker as well. The location is fantastic. It is about a 10 minute walk to the marina (including waiting at the traffic lights), next to the Raffles Hotel for a quick

title: GOOD REVIEW
desc: Naumi Hotel is amazing! The check in lounge is pretty chill and has free flow beer from 5-7 pm which i feel is cool! The bed is comfortable and the room was pretty and worth the price. I would come back again~ The staff Ivan was very nice and helpful. The “in-training” girls was also helpful!

title: Amazing stay
desc: The executive lounge was cool as there was a happy hours at 5pm-7pm, where there was beer, red/white wine and prosecco. Not only that there is also coffee, tea, and some small snacks to eat. The trainee Celest was very helpful.

title: Original and friendly
desc: Only had time for one night at this hotel but wish we had longer. Great staff…so friendly and helpful. The room was well appointed and enjoyed all the special touches such as fun messages. It is also centrally located so easy to get to many sites.

title: Lovely Boutique Hotel
desc: Excellent Service. We arrived early, Angelina and her team took care of us. We loved the place, only stayed for one night unfortunately. The location is great. Angelina is great. Room was clean and nice.

title: Great experience
desc: My experience staying in this hotel was great, the staff members were very very nice, the hotel location was perfect, the hotel architecture is brilliant, everything you could expect from a Singapore Hotel.

title: Good for families
desc: I traveled to this area with my family. Two adults and two kids (7 and 4 years old). We stayed in a suite. It was perfect for us. The room is huge and has all the amenities needed for a comfortable stay.

title: A nice boutique hotel in a great location for exploring Singapore.
desc: This was my 7th visit to Singapore but my first visit to the Naumi Hotel. It is a boutique hotel with a great feel from the minute you walk into the lobby with nice decor, cool art and ambient lighting. I had the Habitat Room (7th Floor) which had a great shower and a comfortable bed. There were chocolates and Singapore Cake in my room on arrival. The location was perfect for exploring Singapore too, which I did on foot, and there are plenty of bars and restaurants all in easy reach. My room was around GB£180 a night (without breakfast) . The roof-top bar and infinity pool looked great although as I hadn't packed my swimming trunks I didn't get to use it... I hope to return in 2024 so I'll take a dip then!!

title: Naumi Hotel
desc: A fantastic hotel and would highly recommend. Staff are very friendly and happy to help with any needs. Good food and drinks. Fantastic modern rooms Great roof top pool with a awesome view. Only a small hotel but a brilliant one

title: Comfortable
desc: Comfortable. Bed was comfy, good water pressure, and the room itself was lovely.Best hotel. Naumi is my favorite spot in the city.The other hotels in Singapore got NOTHING on Naumi!! Awesome Service..

title: Great boutique hotel in walking distance to most sights.
desc: Naumi hotel is a great boutique hotel with walking distance to most sights and places in Singapore. Singapore being a very walkable city anyway. Rooms are practical and nice decor and a good bed. I like the layout with bathroom being part of the room, and even double as extra space for your things. Room has all you need, with kettle, coffee machine, hairdryer, iron and iron board. Minibar / fridge with non-alcoholic drinks. Reception is very helpful and service minded, from recommending restaurants and ordering taxi. I had a late check-out due to late flight, and they were very accommodating. You have Raffles hotel just across for any high-tea, 15 min walk to Clarke Quay and 10 min walk to Bugis center, 30 min walk to Chinatown and 15 min to Arab street. We had breakfast

title: best location, best value, great service
desc: this hotel is surprisingly good and exceeds your expectations. Next to iconic Raffles hotel, location cannot be better, the swimming pool, is one of the best view you can enjoy Singapore. The rooms are very clean, and super well designed. hotel have several small details thought of and decorated with various modern art that you can surprise yourself at each angle. Staff is very friendly. Do not be fooled by the small appearance, a small lobby and street entry. once you dive in to this property you will fully enjoy.it. nothing you will miss in your room as you would expect in a luxury hotel. I stay in various 5 star hotels and this hotel not only surprised me but also exceeded all my expectations. thank you ! fully recommended

title: Quite spacious
desc: The room was much more spacious than expected, and the reception staff was very kind and helpful when we arrived much earlier than we anticipated for check-in! The whole experience could not have been more pleasant.

title: Fun hotel in the heart of the city.
desc: Although slightly on the pricier side, Naumi Hotel provides a different room feel to usual hotels. Spacious as well, great for couple's staycation or maybe a special day. There's also a rooftop bar with an infinity pool. Location is great as well as its a walkable distance to Singapore's few shopping areas, namely, Bugis, Orchard and Suntec City. Many bars/bistros as well just next to the hotel, as well as a unique crepe cafe nearby as well. Would recommend for anyone with a little cash to spare.

title: I’ll be back
desc: After nearly two years of delay I set off to the Naumi to take my mum on her BIG birthday trip. Two sets of friends had honeymooned at the Naumi and it came highly recommended, and the recommendation did not disappoint! I’ve been to Singapore a few times before but have never stayed here but glad I did! The room is spacious for a city hotel and when we arrived it was decorated to celebrate my mum’s birthday and there was even cake! The shower is excellent as are the toiletries. Some reviews have said that coat hangers were in low supply but we asked for more and got them instantly! The roof pool and lounge area is stunning and I spent many an hour up there reading and enjoying the daily 5-7pm (free drinks) happy hour. The slight draw back about the pool area I would say is

title: 4 night stay March 2023
desc: Stayed in the “habitat” room. On the positive side, the location is great and we had a quiet room. The staff is helpful and service good. On the negative side, the “boutique architecture” means that the only sink of the room is in hallway/kitchenette and the hotel is very dark at all times. The gym ticks the box but is nothing to enjoy. There is nowhere to hang/store your clothes in the room. Overall a neutral- experience, overpriced.

title: Photo shown and physical feel is totally different
desc: Photo shown from many webpage is so luxury but physical encounter is totally different. Do not opt for their breakfast save that money for better food outside. Past negative comment are true! Local there for staycation will not be entertained. They only bother to serve foreigner. Overall, not worth to stay and price is way too high.

title: Terrible room condition, very noisy, needs upgrading, would not recommend. Pool area needs upgrading. Great location.
desc: Great location with lovely staff. The hotel is definitely not 5 star. It is in poor condition. The pool itself is fantastic with great views but the area around the pool requires cleaning / upgrading & the toilet / change area is disgusting, dirty! Our room had shower seals broken, toilet flush needed adjusting, not a clean feel. We were on the second floor & the noise from the street / bar / restaurant was terrible, so noisy they leave one set ( not two!) ear plugs beside bed. Would not recommend or stay here again. It was the worst hotel of our 3 week holiday. On the positive mini bar is free, kettle, snacks at reception. We were able to get early check in/ late check out & use pool area while waiting.

title: Great location, but disappointing experience and bad value for money
desc: Disappointing stay. The best part was the location of course, and the nice rooftop pool with gorgeous views on the city, but apart from that the room (habitat) was so small and cramped, and although nice for pictures, not convenient at all (sink in the middle of the room; no space to store clothes properly). Insulation is really poor as you can hear adjacent room’s tvs and other noises… Service is poor as no one really make us feel welcome, the rooftop bar is basically abandoned and you need to call a number for service (if they have time to answer the phone). The only nice staff we met were the cleaning ladies who were lovely. For the hefty price paid I feel like it was clearly overpriced and needs a lot of work to be a truly nice hotel.

title: Good value
desc: I enjoyed my stay at Naumi. Very nice location, good room and friendly and efficient service. There are plenty of nice restaurants in the neighborhood and it was easy to walk to central Singapore. A very pleasant stay!

title: Great staff, Great location
desc: This small boutique hotel is right next door to the Raffles hotel and a much better option than it’s overpriced neighbour. It is stylish and quirky, with well equipped rooms and quality linens and toiletries. The staff make it great though. So helpful and friendly it was a joy to come back after a busy day exploring. They also went out of their way to cater for specific dietary needs. Everything you want in a city break.

title: LOVE.
desc: LOVE. OMG!! This place is INCREDIBLE! Soooo luxurious without breaking the bank. Loved their happy hour.Workers were very friendly and welcoming.Naumi is my favorite spot in the city.... Highly Recommended

title: Great Singapore Hotel
desc: Very clean, helpful staff, and great location. I was looking something within walking distance to restaurants and city life and this was it. Our room was well appointed and late check in was super easy. I highly recommend and would definitely stay here again.

title: Great stay.
desc: Lounge perks was a pleasant surprise. Chill and cool vibes. Great spacious room. Friendly staff. Hassle free. Location was excellent with many cool options for dining and drinks in the hood. Torn between exploring and staying in hotel.

title: Uniqe, tranquil and great location.
desc: From the moment we arrived until we left, our experience was almost faultless. We were looking for a hotel which was central to as many attractions as possible from the vast array Singapore offers. This was our last stop on a 3 month world tour, and whilst it would have been nice to stay with the famous neighbours, we couldn't justify the cost. We were looking for something clean, friendly with a great location and with realistic value for money. Farah, who greeted us, was awesome and made checking in a joy. Her wealth of knowledge and friendliness was wonderful. The rest of the team were also very professional but on just a couple of occasions we felt there were times that certain members of staff could be a little more attentive, especially when we had lunch there. We

title: Naumi is my go-to
desc: Any time I come to Singapore, I already know where I’m going to stay: Naumi. Our room was well appointed and late check in was super easy. I highly recommend and would definitely stay here again.... Thanks

title: Luxurious hotel
desc: Our stay was so luxurious and attentive, I think at every turn we were impressed by the attention to detail and customer-centric everything. The room was very luxe and incredibly comfortable, for two of us it was more than plenty of space, after coming from Japan I finally felt like I wasn't tripping over my luggage constantly.

title: Lovely hotel!
desc: Lovely hotel! Very modern and chic decoration! The drinks at the rooftop bar are delicious! My wife and I go there often just to get out on the town! We live close by but if we didn’t we would choose to stay there on vacation!

title: Exceptional!
desc: The hotel, the room, the staff, all exceptional! The bed was extremely comfortable and the bathroom was huge!! I highly recommend their Singapore location and I’m excited to stay at other Naumi hotel locations!

title: Hidden Jewel
desc: Talk about a hidden jewel. It may not seem like the flashiest hotel, but as soon as you enter, you know it’s exactly where you’re supposed to be. At least, that’s how I felt. I’m sure a lot of people can empathize.

title: Loved it
desc: I stayed at the Naumi for Chinese New Year and loved my stay. The staff is friendly and fun, the food was very good and it is in a great location, especially for all the New Year festivities, and such a great price!

title: I extended my stay
desc: I had the pleasure of staying at Naumi for 4 nights and 5 days. I enjoyed my stay there so much that I decided to stay for another 5 days. The staff is always friendly and welcoming and promised to remember me should I return in the future.

title: We couldn’t seem to leave
desc: We liked it so much that we extended our trip just to have one more night at the Naumi. We lounged at the pool, grabbed a drink at the bar, and spent hours in the room that were very much needed in our marriage.

title: I felt right at home
desc: I enjoyed my stay at this hotel. They really know how to make guests feel at home. I usually experience a deep homesickness a few days into any trip, but it wasn’t as bad this time and I would chalk it up to their excellent staff.

title: A+
desc: Quiet, clean rooms, friendly and attentive staff, breakfast was so so, but the hotel is in the perfect location if you’re a tourist or in town for business. I’d give them an A for the stay and a + for the design and rooftop pool.

title: Truly amazing experience
desc: Just a truly amazing experience; 5-star but still with the feel of a boutique hotel. The rooms were beyond my expectations and I adored the view from our room. I give them a 10 out of 10 without a doubt.

title: All in all wonderful
desc: Incredible place. Amazing spa, wonderful and friendly staff. Beautiful design. Great food. We felt welcome and relaxed from the moment we walked in. All in all a wonderful experience and I would be more than happy to stay here again if we return to Singapore.

title: Fantastic
desc: Had a fantastic stay at Naumi Hotel. I especially enjoyed the breakfast, it was plenty of food and with a good amount of variety. The coffee was excellent, which was important to me as I can’t start my day without a good cup.

title: One of the best
desc: This is one of the best hotels I’ve ever stayed at. Has an amazing view, rooms are incredible, and the service is flawless. I don’t have a single negative thing to say about it or my experience staying there.

title: Great boutique hotel
desc: Very good stay ! Great location ! Love the choices of arts all around the hotel, kind of cool/funky. Excellent service from front desk. Boutique hotel feel. The breakfast could be a little "better", rather standard. Nice pool with awesome views on the roof top ! Quiet rooms. Housekeeping could be a little more consistent ( replenishment not consistent). Highly recommended and will come back ! Thks

title: Cool sustainable hotel
desc: Hotel is great, well located in busy area just don't take the options for breakfast. I liked the hotel design and proximity to a local low key night scene. I welcome more ideas to be sustainable beyond the usual things like multiple towel use.

title: Overrated and not worth the price
desc: Room is not properly ready, no towels in room and staff was bit impatient when I called front desk to ask. Next day, no new toiletries was provided. Check out time, asked to arrange taxi but keyed in wrong address and I almost have to paid taxi fee even though I was ask to go down before reached my destination

title: Great hotel in Singapore
desc: Excellent location. Very friendly and helpful staff. Nice room but on the small side. Could offer more breakfast choices as quite limited for price. Roof top pool and lounge area lovely with good view of city. I would definitely stay here again.

title: Fantastic boutique hotel in a great location
desc: Brilliant small boutique hotel in a fantastic location (just off of Beach road and right next door to Raffles). Stayed for business in for 7 nights and was really impressed with level of service and the quality of the hotel. Fantastic roof-top pool and free flow drinks each evening all part of the brilliant service offered here. The staff were very polite, helpful and friendly too! I will definitely be returning in the future.

title: Nice 4* hotel
desc: Had a good stay in a habitat room. Location is good opposite raffles hotel,he Marriott and a short walk to the mrt sub at raffles city. Check in was efficient. The room has everything you need. We had two large cases and the room is already very compact. It’s very open concept, a little capsule in its design. There isn’t much privacy in the room with an open bathroom (glass privacy screen). The bed was comfortable and the products were nice in the bathroom with some complimentary refreshments in the fridge. The dressing area/desk lacked a mirror but all in all had everything you needed. Pool/rooftop was nice too. I would recommend for a one or two night stay but the practicalities of the open concept and lack of space in a habitat room would become hard work with a

title: Comfy clean location
desc: Naumi is a boutique hotel. Rooms are nicely designed and bed are comfortable, hotel is very clean and location is very good. However breakfast need big improvements, it’s very basic and no good quality ingredients. With a better quality breakfast that this hotel would deserve scoring would be 5/5

title: Enjoyable
desc: We completely enjoyed our stay at this hotel. Staff went above and beyond to make sure our stay was comfortable, and they pointed us in the direction of some fun spots we wouldn’t have known about otherwise.

title: Post-stay survey
desc: Overall experience is good! But it would be better if facial cleanser is supplied and more USB connectors are available. Also, I would like the room has more lights and maybe extra blanket prepared in the room for easy access - the AC is really cold.

title: Quirky comfortable hotel in great location
desc: Service on arrival and departure was excellent. Arranged taxi for us to the airport. Hotel room was beautiful and well appointed and very comfortable bed. Rooftop pool, bar and food were awesome. Really great location right next door to Raffles!

title: 2 thumbs up!
desc: You cannot miss out on Naumi Hotel if you visit Singapore. You’ll feel at home very quickly with many points of interest right around the corner. Everything is easy to get to even if you hate walking.

title: Wonderful
desc: Wonderful atmosphere, extremely attentive and professional service. Cozy yet elegantly decorated rooms that are inviting and comfortable. Exciting, fun vibes at the rooftop bar and a gorgeous view of the city.

title: The best in the city
desc: This is by far the best hotel in Singapore. From the second you arrive until you checkout they will make you feel special, like you’re an extended family member and not just a customer who’s paying for a room.

title: A good spot in SIN
desc: Nice property Pleasant, clean and covenient rooms Good location ; next to Raffles ; quiet place Friendly staff Breakfast buffet good quality Great rroftop with swimming-pool and fantastic view of the City skyline NICE BOUTIQUE HOTEL

title: Naumi is the spot
desc: Everything you need: great location near amazing bars and restaurants, walking distance to many different areas (including where I was working), great breakfast, rooftop bar with infinity pool on the 10th fllor, friendly helpful staff, clean room, well appointed amenities, and finally, and probably most important, and comfortable bed with many different pillow options. Winner!

title: Good hardware, lack of staff??
desc: Naumi Singapore Location: Conveniently situated in between Suntec city, City Hall and Bugis Junction, you have many choices for food and shopping. Room: Eden room comes with a big round bathtub, fitted two pax easily. Minibars and snacks are complimentary. Happy hour from 5-7 pm at Level 3, served tibits and limited drinks only, no hot food. Pool: Rooftop pool has a great view. Nice for taking photos. My stay was a weekday, no one manning the pool though. Breakfast at Level 1 was disappointing. Limited selection and was largely forgettable. Overall, love the tubs and pool. Forget about breakfast. Plenty of food choices nearby.

title: Just right
desc: The room wasn’t huge, but it was more than enough to accommodate me. I didn’t have a chance to swim around in the pool, but I did take a moment to check it out and can confirm that it is indeed very cool.

title: Comfortable hotel
desc: I really enjoyed my stay at Naumi in May 2023. The rooms and bed were comfortable and we were accommodated with baggage storage for our late flight on our last day. The infinity pool on the rooftop is a really nice area to chill out. The rooms are small, but they are very clean and nice, although a few more hooks for hanging items such a towels would be helpful. Approx 5-10 min walk to two nearby tube stations. Overall I would stay here again and I would recommend this hotel to other travellers.

title: Naumi Hotel stay 20 - 24 May 2023
desc: From being accommodated with both a very early check-in and late checkout; baggage assistance; transport, (taxi) arrangements: warm greetings for every coming and going, the team at Naumi could not have been more friendlier or helpful.

title: Love and will come back
desc: Overall, very impressed by the hotel, had a wonderful experience and truly enjoyed my stay here. Thanks to all the staff that made it happen. I wouldn’t have had the wonderful trip I did without all of you.

title: Impressive
desc: This is a really impressive hotel in Singapore. The rooms are with incredible view and all amenities you expect from a 5* hotel. My wife was especially impressed by the bathroom and the general decoration of the room.

title: We couldn’t seem to leave
desc: 5 stars isn’t doing the Naumi Hotel Singapore justice as we were amazed when we first walked through their doors and everything after that moment far exceeded our expectations. They deserve 100 stars!

title: Very good
desc: Service was very good, and the staff were doing their best to satisfy our every whim. I appreciated their level of attention to detail as a meticulous man of industry myself. I would definitely choose to stay here again.

title: Perfect location
desc: The location was perfect. We were able to walk just about everywhere and when we were tired of walking, it was cheap and easy to grab an uber. The nearby restaurants were convenient and delicious.....

title: Exceeds expectations
desc: It exceeded all my expectations and considering the fact that my brother and sister-in-law stayed here last year on their honeymoon and recommended it to the rest of the family, my expectations were pretty high!

title: An Excellent Stay in a Great Hotel
desc: Maiming Hotel is located in the downtown area of Singapore. It is a modern building with full amenities. Close to restaurants and shopping malls, it has a fine restaurant, Florian’s, which serves hearty breakfast and a fabulous evening selection of wonderful meals. My Room was a Patio Room. An outdoor Infinity Pool is located on Level 10 and there is plenty of room to sit and lounge, and swim. The room was great with everything necessary, close at hand . Staff were great. Tim and the team at front desk were able to solve all issues with a minimum of fuss. Room cleaners kept the room spicy and span and the restaurant staff were attentive, courteous and professional, and every meal was a test. I highly recommend Naumi Hotel and would happily return on my next visit.

title: Would recommend
desc: I would absolutely recommend this hotel to anyone – couples, families, solo travelers, business travelers, you name it - and will definitely be staying here again when I come back into town next year.

title: Great hotel in a good location to see the sights
desc: Great hotel in a great location . It is in walking distance to a lot of the main sites and has a great roof top pool with views of the city. Rooms are a good size, comfy bed and everything you need for a few days on this wonderful city. Loads of nice bars and restaurants in the surrounding area.

title: We had an incredible experience
desc: We had an incredible experience staying there. We loved the hotel. It was beautiful, comfortable and perfectly located in the city. Service was super friendly, everything was tidy and clean. I would definitely come back and can highly recommend it. Thank you for the great experience!

title: Loved the rooftop pool
desc: Was in town for a conference nearby and found this to be a nice hotel in a good location. The rooftop pool was great for an early morning swim before heading out to work. Bed was comfortable, and the air con worked fantastically.

title: Nice place to stay
desc: This hotel is a very nice place to stay, beautiful property in a great location in Singapore. The staff was super friendly, competent and always helpful, I enjoyed my interactions with them. The amenities were up to par and the WiFi was incredibly reliable.

title: For a 5* hotel it could be much better
desc: Hotel is in amazing location with friendly staff. Very disappointed with the quality of the mattress considering it’s a 5* hotel, it was extremely hard and we had to ask for a bed topped which made no difference. Woke up achy every morning. Staff were friendly but for 2 out of the 4 night stay when they cleaned our room they didn’t put towels or robes back so we had to call twice which was annoying. The rooms are nice and clean and a good size but not worth the moment for the quality of the mattress.

title: Clean, professional, excellent
desc: Clean big rooms and excellent customer service. The food is amazing, the staff is nice and it’s very pleasant to stay here. Would be happy to come back not only for business but also a private trip...

title: We had a pleasant experience
desc: Excellent location, a short walk to the National Library. Their concierge was very friendly and helpful, and their staff was very courteous and accommodating. We had a very pleasant experience. We will stay there again.

title: An oasis in the city
desc: Great central location with amazing eateries nearby. The room was comfortable and very clean. The rooftop bar was a great in-house destination especially in the evenings with an amazing view of the city. Staff were friendly, knowledgeable and accommodating to our requests. The 5-7pm complementary drinks in the lounge was a nice touch. Will definitely be staying again next time we visit Singapore.

title: Pleasantly surprised
desc: You won’t be disappointed and will be pleasantly surprised. Hotel is clean and modern. Rooms are chic, with excellent views of the city. Good comfy beds with nice pillows and thick, silky soft bedding.

title: Excellent boutique hotel
desc: Room excellent for one but maybe a little small for two otherwise excellent. Complementary afternoon tea is a nice touch. Didn’t have breakfast but this is served in lobby area. Situated just behind Raffles Hotel.

title: Everything was great
desc: This hotel is literally in the perfect spot! Nice large rooms for families, gorgeous views from the rooftop pool, and SOOOOOO CLEAN. The staff at the hotel were great and very very helpful with anything we needed.

title: Extremely friendly
desc: The Naumi Hotel staff were extremely friendly and accommodating the entire week my fiancé and I were there. It couldn’t have been a better pre-wedding vacation for the two of us. It was everything we needed.

title: Highly recommend
desc: Super cool hotel. Couldn’t recommend it more. Man I hate that these review sites do word counts now. Like seriously? I can’t just say that it’s a cool hotel and leave it at that. No wonder less and less people are writing reviews. They make you jump through hoops.

title: Safe choice
desc: Wonderful stay in a superb location with tons of great food options around! You can find whatever you want close by. Also, I felt extremely safe there as a solo female traveler. No regrets about my choice.

title: Best hotel
desc: Naumi Hotel is a must for anyone traveling to Singapore. I have stayed at several hotels in the city and none of them can compare. My only regret is that it took me so long to do my research to find this hotel.

title: Sublime
desc: Great lounge, fitness center, and pool. Fine linens and comfortable mattress. I didn’t have their breakfast so I can’t speak on that, but with their high standards it’s safe to assume that it’s great.

title: Great Location and Service
desc: Travelling for Business very convenient location. All the details of the hotel makes your stay easier. Small but very nice breakfast. Staff very friendly and helpful. Stunning infinity pool and roof top.

title: I love it!
desc: My boyfriend surprised me with a trip to Singapore for my birthday and this is the hotel we stayed at. I honestly couldn’t imagine a better choice! I don’t know how he found this gem, but he totally crushed it.

title: Loved every minute!!
desc: Wow! So happy I chose this hotel! They have thought of everything from guest happy hour, to refreshments in the lobby and question/answer dice in the rooms. It felt modern, luxe and was right in the heart of the city surrounded by the top sights and great food - take me back!!

This was the best boutique hotel I've stayed in Singapore! I loved how the service and amenities was of a luxury hotel, but there was also quirkiness and character in the design and decor of the rooms! My room was clean, spacious, and felt comfortable over my 3 night stay. The location was perfect as it was in the middle of everything, and all the tourist locations are a short 5-10min grab ride. I highly recommend Naumi hotels and will be back!

title: Serendipitous
desc: I only booked this hotel out of convenience—mostly because the pricing was really competitive. Somehow, it ended up being one of my favorite hotels ever. Truly seems like the stars aligned in my favor.

title: Outstanding!
desc: The most detail oriented hotel that I ever stayed! The design of the room is so unique and everything will catch your attention even a laundry bag or tv controller box. The have a rooftop swimming pool with nice city view !! You can definitely have a nice photo over there! All staff is super friendly from the beginning to the end ! Will definitely come back for the next stay!

title: I am coming back
desc: I can’t believe I never wrote I review for Naumi! I just stayed there for the second time, and it was just as good as the first, if not better. Guess who’s coming back here for a third time? Meeeee! ;)

title: Excellent customer service
desc: World class customer service. We appreciate them for employing people who speak good English. I know we should’ve tried to learn the language, but it would’ve been impossible with only a few months’ notice.

title: Remarkable
desc: It’s rare that I have a remarkable enough experience to bother writing a review, but I was so blown away by Naumi that I felt compelled to leave them a glowing review. Everything about it was immaculate.

title: Really good
desc: This is a nice hotel. Very modern but not overbearingly so. The rooms look exactly the same in person as they do on the website, if not even better. The evenings were pristine. Serves a tasty breakfast.

title: Overall good stay
desc: Enjoyed my stay overall but wish that the breakfast selection was more varied. It's quite a small selection and I expected more from a five star hotel. Placement of socket for the hairdryer was not ideal and I couldn't style my hair facing the mirror (because the mirror doesn't turn and the hair dryer cord does not stretch that much).

title: Vacationing with kids
desc: My family was in Singapore for two weeks, and we stayed at Naumi for three nights. We definitely could’ve stayed there longer. I guess that gives a good excuse to come back sometime in the near future.

title: Unique!
desc: Naumi Hotel is just amazing! We had a gorgeous room with all sorts of thoughtful details you wouldn’t normally see at most hotels. Also pricing was reasonable, especially for the quality and location.

title: Short n sweet
desc: The last night of my short over after a trip to the UK. Appearance of the hotel was delightful- interesting, quirky. Room was comfortable, a different standard hotel room design. Lots of eating places up n down the street and places to visit within walking distances. Staff was helpful. I would consider returning on my next trip

title: Good hotel with nice ambience
desc: hotel breakfast was good:> especially the eggs~ staff were pleasant and helpful:) truly enjoyed my stay. the room that i booked came with a big bathtub which was the highlight of my stay! the pool had beautiful views from where it was situated.

title: High five to Naumi staff.
desc: Naumi staff are very courteous, professional, helpful, and accommodating, especially Tim at the reception desk. Naumi Hotel Singapore is highly recommendable, and it not that far from the marina bay, NRT and bus stations.

title: MY DREAM STAY!
desc: Its a stunning hotel! The staff are very professional, kindness and very sincere. Service was 10 star! A big shout out for front desk manager - Ivan! Thank you so much! We had a minor issue and he made the day for us. The rooftop pool is beyond imagination! Its so cozy and modern! If I ever back to Singapore, that is the only place to stay!

title: Very relaxing and enjoyable stay
desc: We had a very relaxing and enjoyable stay. The room was lovely and comfortable and the rooftop pool area was greatly appreciated given Singapore’s humidity. The complimentary Happy Hour added to our overall experience. Also the note was able to accommodate us with early and late complimentary checkin/out.

title: Exquisite hotel
desc: Our stay was nothing short of exquisite! Naumi is the definition of a 5-star hotel. Actually, I’d give them even more stars if I could! Cheers to whoever’s in charge of maintaining this wonderful hotel.

Ten out of ten all the way for Naumi!! It was everything I hoped it would be and more. I would absolutely recommend this hotel. In fact, I’ve already sent a link to all my friends who’ve been asking about it.

title: Perfection
desc: HIGHLY recommend. I was greeted by one of the employees who swiftly checked me in, then told me about some of the events that were going on in the area. My room was perfect and the bed was simply heavenly.

title: # 1 Hotel
desc: There are a ton of great hotels to choose from in Singapore, however Naumi Hotel will forever be my top pick. For one, they have the most comfortable rooms. Second, NO ONE can beat their infinity pool.

title: Couple’s retreat
desc: My husband and I stayed here during our much-needed vacation. If you’re looking for a relaxing destination to get away from it all, then you should go to Singapore and specifically stay at Naumi Hotel.

title: Great place
desc: Great place, good location, good value for money, friendly staff & clean. Close to MRT stations in Raffles Place &Suntech City. Also direct MRT line to Changi airport (we took a Grab.) Chijmes around the corner for places te eat, close to downtown centre & Clarke Quay for nights out. Didn’t try the breakfast, went to places nearby.

title: Great location, Very helpful and friendly people, Good value
desc: I was greeted very warmly at the door, that I thought I knew the lady. Check-in and out was a breeze. Room design is modern but also cozy. Bed was super nice. Great overhead shower, and they have a separate drinking water faucet so you don't have to buy water. Will try their restaurant on the first floor. Location is surrounded by so many good restaurants and bars as well.

title: Excellent Choice
desc: Lovely hotel with attention to detail. Friendly and helpful staff. Very comfortable rooms and especially the bed. Love the "happy hour" drinks concept as a way to meet with other guests and share their Singapore travel tips. Lovely infinity pool and outdoor area. Great location.

title: Outstanding!
desc: We stayed for 2 nights in July and cannot rate it highly enough! We arrived after a long haul flight to the hotel at 9am, expecting to have to leave our bags as check in was not until 3pm however they let us in our room straight away. The room was impeccable - beautiful finish and lovely touches (coffee, snacks and they left a birthday cake and hand written note for my partner). Perfect location to access main sights of the city. Highly recommend. I’m

title: Many interesting spots
desc: Super nice hotel in the center of Singapore. Museums and many other attractions are walking distance from there. We discovered something new every day just by walking in a different direction each time.

title: Honeymoon near u
desc: Very beautiful hotel with beautiful staffs. All i can say is that u got to see and feel it to believe it. I would said the place is majestic. Naumi makes us feel like we belong there. Well its for u review readers to book and get your experience of the hotel

title: Awesome stay!
desc: Hub's birthday . Gave a complementary mini cake. Mini bar first round was free. Didn't expect that as many hotel have nth or chargeable. They gave me a baby cot for my baby and was suprised to see mini bathtub and shower essential for my baby. I love it. Pool view is amazing. Highly recommended.

title: Naumi short stay
desc: Excellent service from Christopher & staff who are caring, positive & professional. Our room was wonderful and combined with the location to great restaurants, traditional eats and views from the rooftop pool/ bar we can say this hotel is a wonderful boutique stay. It is a hotel with a fun focus on the arts & culture.

title: Awesome location, unique vibe!
desc: Recently back from 5 days at Naumi. What a perfect location for travelers of all Singapore experience. Conveniently placed just off one of the city's main thoroughfares in Beach Rd, the hotel is nestled next door to archetypal landmark - the Raffles Hotel. You are never too far away from major bus routes, MRT stations (City Hall and Bugis) ... and most importantly in Singapore, food outlets! Within Seah St alone there are dozens... merely scratching the surface of Singapore's uniquely incredible food culture. The hotels facilities are great. A truly in incredible pool with views of the city! The rooms are well stocked with useful amenities: coffee machine, filtered water tap, free mini bar(!), amongst others. The hotel staff are extremely friendly, and more than happy to

title: My first visit in Singapur
desc: The hotel was perfect for my First visit in Singapore. I appreciated the location, the friendlyness of the staff, the comfort of the modern Boutique-Hotel and my guestroom as well. I will recommend the NAUMI to my friends and would chose it for my next stay in Singapore.

title: Delightful hotel in a great part of town
desc: The hotel is well situated for shopping and eating out. It has a delightful pool area with a pool bar. The artwork is delightful and intriguing. The bedrooms are comfortable and have good storage space and iron and ironing board.

title: Nice place to stay
desc: Nice hotel different from the big size hotels you normally encounter during trips. The rooms and the personnel are very good as much as the cleaning is above average. The breakfast is limited in choice and they do miss a decent espresso coffee which is not acceptable for such a "pretend to be" stylish and modern hotel. The gym space is also not very large and distributed over 3 different floors.

title: Terrible service and dirty hotel
desc: Avoid this hotel. Is terrible. Expensive. You need to do everything by yourself. Unfriendly enployees. Everything is dirty and built with the cheapest materials. I dont recoment this hotel. Can not understand why is a 5 star hotel.

title: Explore Singapore
desc: The very best place to explore Singapore next to every Place ewen if you will go by foot. We stay ther 10 days to explore Singapore and in the near are two bus stations and one subway station, a 12 minutes footwalk to the Merlion or a 20 minutes footwalk to the Marina Bay Sand or Gardens. Nearby Chinatown (4 Bus Stops) or Little India (4 Bus stops) . Good relax on the roof top pool.

title: Great place to stay in the middle of everything
desc: Naumi is a nice hotel that is in walking distance from almost anything in Singapore CBD. Very friendly staff and the room was simply great. Plenty of places to eat outside near by and nice roof top pool too.

title: Vert nice. Perfect location
desc: Very nice hotel with a gorgeous view! Perfect location. Well cleaned. Appreciated that coffee and snacks are available all day long in the living room. Friendly staff. Just a pity that the rooftop bar is not exploited enough.

title: Perfect place to stay in Singapore
desc: Highly recommended. Very polite, friendly staff. It was our first time in Singapore and we couldn't have chosen a better place to stay. Rooms are small and stylish. They got everything needed. Snacks and drinks were also provided!

title: Great location
desc: Despite the bed mattress being quite hard and not having blissful sleep due to the hardness, the hotel was fantastic and in the best location. Staff were friendly and helpful and tried to add something to make the mattress softer. Maybe it was just our room, other beds might be better?

title: Beautiful hotel, great staff & perfect location
desc: What a gorgeous boutique hotel! There is nothing not to like. The staff are so helpful. The location is fabulous - opposite Raffles, MRT stations close by, myriad eating outlets across a range of budgets at your doorstep. Our room was spacious, luxurious (loved the deep bath), quiet, and a true haven at the end of a busy day exploring Singapore. The pool area is a highlight - so lovely up there with a birds-eye view of Singapore. Absolutely recommend this boutique hotel.

title: Great little find
desc: Great hotel, really couldn’t fault it! Beds comfy, rooms spacious and well equipped! Happy hour was great, so make sure you head to the third floor for that glass of Prosecco every day! Lovely helpful staff. Would definitely stay again if we came to Singapore again!

title: Very good hotel
desc: The location is convenient - 10 minutes walk to Bugis MRT station where you can catch the subway. There are also bus stops closeby as well. The swimming pool is nice to take a dip in after a day in the city. The Habitat room is quite small however.

title: a good choice: location, intimate
desc: the hotel is well placed next to the Rafles hotel in the historic center. The boutique hotel side is pleasant. The rooms are modern and more decoration would be nice. The swimming pool on the 10th floor has a waouuuu view with the sky line

title: Chic hotel with all the animals
desc: Very nice hotel close to the Suntac convention center where we were attending a conference. Initially booked a larger brand hotel through the conference website but happened upon Naumi hotel which was closed and advertised as a boutique hotel so we switched. The Raffles Hotel is just across the street. Everything was perfect with our stay. We arrived late from the US and somewhat disoriented. The lady at reception was very helpful with checking us in, telling us about all the amenities and suggesting places we could grab some food at the late hour, including delivery. The rooms are stylish, clean and comfortable. Took us a bit to figure out which light switch went with which light as the layout was a little confusing. The small fridge has several non alcoholic beverages that

title: Could be best hotel in Singapore, but...
desc: Location (next to Raffles, 20 minutes by foot to Marina Bay Sands and Gardens, 20 minutes by foot to Merlion, 20 minutes by foot to boat quay, etc.) and pool (breathtaking views on really all Singapore attractions) are hard to beat. However the hotel already had the best years behind itself and needs urgent refurbishment. Some of the hotel areas also made some tacky impressions, especially the lobby and pool deck bar. Mildew can be spotted in various parts of the open-air premises so some barrels of paint would definately help. The breakfast was... a joke. It really felt like being served in a youth hostel rather than being hosted in a 5* hotel, with room prices over 300 SGD/ night. All hot dishes were cold, fruit was dry, danish selection tasted like LEGO. Again location and

title: Great Hotel
desc: Great location, excellent service & staff. Cleaners were on the ball & left a calling card even when we had the do not disturb sign on. Nothing was too hard. Stayed in a Habitat room this time & wasn’t disappointed, had everything we needed, even ironing board & iron within the bed draws.

title: Great modern boutique hotel
desc: This hotel is very cute, modern and comfortable. The staff are all very friendly and helpful and the rooms and facilities were very comfortable. It is located in a great central location and getting around is a breeze. They really pay attention to the small details too and make your stay very pleasent. Would return again in a heart beat!

title: Wonderful stay
desc: I had a wonderful stay there. The pool view is really a breath taking, a very cosy and very chill area. The staffs are very friendly and helpful. Would definitely stay there again and recommend my friends or family.

title: Very poor breakfast
desc: The breakfast is unacceptable for a 5 star hotel. Its a 3 star hotel breakfast. Plus the worker there was very unprofessional. We asked for a omolete, they didnt have ham. Not many options to eat. There was like 5 options - the cereals section offered like 3 cereals (mainly for children), juices are not fresh, the fruit didnt look good. I asked for an omolete of ham and cheese, they didn’t have ham, and the cheese came on top of the omolete (like parmesiano cheese). It was unacceptable

title: Quirky Hotel
desc: Checked in for a two-night stay before Christmas for a birthday celebration. The staff kindly presented us a cake and two glasses of champagne for our celebration, which was a really nice gesture. The room was small but comfortable. The view from the rooftop infinity pool was nice given that this is a small boutique hotel. Location of the hotel isn't the most convenient but still relatively near the eating places and malls. Prices on the higher side but pretty worthwhile.

title: Overnight business trip
desc: Short notice trip to Singapore and needed a hotel in the centre. This is a small hotel but the rooms are fantastic - washbasin is an island in the room itself! Staff friendly and all facilities available. Hotel restaurant is Indian which suited me. Small pool on the roof with a bar. Perfect end to a busy day supping beers with the backdrop of the Singapore skyline.

title: Nice boutique hotel
desc: Great little boutique hotel located close to transport. Pros -Friendly staff and clean room. The rooftop pool had a nice view of the city Breakfast was ok, nothing special. Cons - I didn't like the cloying perfume around the reception and elevator areas - just gave me a headache every time.

title: Spectacular service with luxurious rooms
desc: I want to congratulate Naumi Hotel and its team including manager Michelle and her team members V, Eugene, Kai to name a few for the spectacular services they have provided. Having stayed at nearly all the top brand 5 stars hotels in Singapore, I have to say I have never had such warm and personalized service as Naumi Hotel. The staff are extremely helpful and warm, the rooms are wonderful with a nice range of soft drinks and snacks. Lovely roof top lounge and great locations! A memorable experience and I can't wait to stay there again! Dr. Simon

title: Unique design, wonderful stay
desc: The hotel is beautifully designed. Location is very convinient as well. The room is spacious, and with modern design. Hotel also provide the rooftop bar with amazing view, and infinity pool where you definitely wouldn't want to miss it during your stay. Staffs are friendly and attentive. Overall, a great place to stay in Singapore.

title: uncomfortable and not enjoyable stay
desc: Room was not very clean enough, towel not refilled. Pillows were to hard and the bed sheet was not very clean. Bathroom water leakage to the room when you are bathing, Hotel agreed to offer a cupcake and personalized greeting card for birthday celebration but nothing provided over our stay.

title: Funky hotel in great location
desc: Design hotel with a cool, modern look. Located right next to Raffles and an easy walk down to the bay. Staff were extreamly helpful when we asked for dinner recommendations and directions. The breakfast had a good selection of foods.

title: Relaxing Rooftop Pool + Amazing Poolside Staff
desc: My fiancé and I celebrated my belated birthday at Naumi Hotel after reading rave reviews about their friendly staff as customer service is one of our top priority next to comfort. We checked in early and although the male concierge was a little cold towards us, the lady concierge was much more cheerful and she also escorted us up to our habitat room and gave us a brief room introduction. We were impressed by the complimentary snack bar and drinks (we absolutely loved the Earl Grey), but were disappointed that the charging cables did not work on our iPhones. We did not pack along our powerbanks as we had read that Naumi rooms provide charging cables. Bummer. We then noticed that the bed and pillows weren't just comfortable, Naumi also provided a bolster! How thoughtful for

title: Compact and Bijou
desc: A friendly welcome awaited us at this hotel, a little bit different from your average hotel. It is a compact but well laid out hotel that seem to have most things you just have to look for it! The rooms are a work of art in fitting all the facilities and equipment into a relatively small but comfortable space. All is provided - you just need to find it in one of the various pull out drawers or cupboards. Nice that a range of snacks and drinks were provided for our stay as well as a Nespresso coffee machine with a range of pods. Lovely infinity pool with a view on top of the hotel with a bar where you can relax and watch the sun go down or even rise. The hotel is situated close to Sun City where you can pick up tour buses (Duck and Hippo tour recommended), shop and eat

title: Funky Boutique Hotel - Great Location
desc: My wife and I stayed in Naumi for 3 nights in Sept 2017. We loved the hotel and will definitely look to stay there again next time we're in Singapore. Location is excellent, a short walk to main downtown attractions, Merlion Park, Marina Bay, China Town, Arab Street, Singapore river all within 15 mins, MRT less that 5 mins away, and right next door to Raffles hotel if you're after a Singapore Sling :) The decor for the hotel is really funky - interesting designs throughout the hotel gave a nice vibe. Rooms are fairly small, but that's to be expected - lay out of the room made good use of space. We never felt cramped in the room. Complimentary bottled water, Nespresso and (soft drink) mini bar is a nice touch. Rooftop pool & bar has nice views of city, and the pool is very

title: Comfortable and quiet stay
desc: We found this hotel to be very well located in the City. Just across the road from Raffles and easy walking distance to the Suntec centre where we picked up the open top bus tour. We stayed in the most basic room, which had all the facilities we needed, but in hindsight we should have upgraded to a larger room. As we were on a stopover before travelling on to Bali, we had two large suitcases with us. There was space for one in the bottom of the wardrobe area, but the other suitcase had to be placed on the floor of the room, which was a bit of an obstacle. Reception staff were great, full of useful advice for places to visit and eat. Breakfast was good. A nice choice of hot and cold food. The rooftop pool was a welcome relief from the hot weather - we enjoyed a drink up

title: great boutique hotel in excellent location
desc: I found this hotel after extensive searching on trip advisor and was really happy I did! We found a good deal on a booking website so felt the value for money was very good - the full price options seemed steep so shop around for the best deals. Its a small hotel which I enjoy because it doesn't have the impersonal feel of the huge resort hotels. Having said that it still had all the amenities you expect from a top class hotel. The room was impeccable with great facilities and a super comfy bed. The lobby and restaurant were also very good - and smelt nice too! Breakfast was very good - even offering some nice healthy options, although would've been nice to see more fresh fruit. Location is superb right next door to raffles and a five minute walk to the MRT station (which is

title: Quirky, cool, stylish, fab location
desc: This hotel is in a fantastic location with bars and restaurants all around and 3 very closes MRT stations. The hotel itself is very stylist and cool, the rooms are fit for purpose and we loved the rooftop pool. There was a good selection at breakfast and the staff were extremely pleasant and helpful. Would definitely stay here again.

title: What a great small hotel
desc: I stayed for three night on a business trip and I felt Naumi is a personable, modern boutique hotel with smart rooms, kind people, great rooftop swimming pool and located at a great location. Try it if you prefer different from standard and fun from boring!

title: Good value lux boutique hotel
desc: Professional staff . Vee & Henny were super helpful for address all questions. Good location, one block from raffles , plenty of restaurants for different variety of food. Roof top bar & pool are spectacular.

title: Excellent Hotel
desc: Excellent Hotel, In a very good Location, the room pretty nice and comfortable, The pool was also really nice, with a cool view, we had just a great time there. The people of the hotel really nice and ready to help with whatever was needed, and good Breakfast included!!

title: Great location, excellent hotel
desc: We stayed here for 4 nights for the Grand Prix and really enjoyed it. We were upgraded from an Oasis room to Camellia (room 204) which was only on the 2nd floor but was I think a bit bigger than the room we had booked. Very comfortable bed - we slept well. Storage not great considering it was a big room - a stylish couple of drawers underneath the TV instead of the trunk would have sorted that out. We loved the breakfasts - especially after it seemed that management responded to an in-stay questionnaire where I mentioned that we would like some different fruit - not just melon..and the next day we got pineapple and papaya! Also, we discovered that you could get freshly cooked eggs and omelettes too, and really good Americano coffee, done just the way we like it, so we were

title: Naumi Hotel, a great place to stay
desc: Quirky, fun, and a great place to stay in Singapore. Great room and fabulous bathroom. Amazing decor throughout the hotel. The staff were very friendly and helpful. Great views from the rooftop infinity pool and bar. Loved the place. Jan, from Sydney

title: Lovely hotel
desc: Beautiful hotel, friendly helpful staff. Very comfortable modern rooms and the most impressive views from the hotel roof pool bar. Located in a very convenient place. The breakfasts are very good and the Indian food served in the evening is absolutely superb. A very enjoyable stay and I would recommend this hotel to anyone

title: Fantastic location, shame about the breakfast!
desc: Really enjoyed 3 nights here, rooms very clean and well appointed and good views of the city finance district skyscrapers from our 9th floor room. Bed nice & big, good shower, complimentary soft drinks & nespresso pods; staff friendly & efficient also. The rooftop pool is a nice place to chill after a few hours exploring the city, although from what we could tell, the bar is only open for events, though they will bring drinks up from the ground floor bar. Location is excellent, in the shadow of the iconic Raffles Hotel and only around 10-15 mins walk to Marina Bay area. There's a couple of decent bars next to the hotel which have a nice atmosphere, drinks aren't particularly cheap but by Singapore standards not too bad. The one issue we had was the breakfast. The hotel

title: Boutique hotel, excellent location, friendly staff
desc: The Naumi hotel is a well run boutique hotel located centrally in Singapore. We pre-booked this hotel as part of our first stop during our honeymoon, we picked it due its excellent location and reviews. Upon arrival the staff were very kind and organised our check in for us as we sat down and had a drink. The kindly pointed out everything in the hotel, restaurant, wifi etc. and showed us to our room. The room itself was a decent size (habitat room) which included an island with sink, mirror and mini bar. Additional storage was found under the bed, the room had apple TV, brolly, robes and everything else you would need. My particular favourite was the magic light in the bathroom area. The best part of the hotel however was the rooftop pool which was very quiet but had great

title: Excellent stay at Naumi
desc: Very comfortable hotel. Modern and chique. Amazing shower! Comfortable bed. Black-out automatic curtains. Good breakfast. Great rooftop pool and bar. Great location. Good and reliable wifi. The only complaint is that the desk is too low compared to the seat...so you cannot slide in under the desk.

title: Flawless, comfortable, beautiful
desc: Stayed here for five nights while visiting a conference. This place was perfect, from the Infinity pool on the roof for a morning swim, to the comfort of the rooms. Staff was very friendly and helpful, breakfast was lovely. Thank you!

title: Spectacular service, beautiful room!
desc: Loved everything about this hotel including breakfast, the lovely Daphne who came and had a natter and made us feel at home as well as the amazing room. The movie channels were a welcome break from the usual choice of BBC news ...common in most other hotels. Great selection of channels here. Beds comfy, shower fab, location perfect. Rooftop pool was also outstanding. Thank you for an amazing stay

title: Excellent stay wish it was longer.
desc: Beautiful boutique accommodation in a great location. Lovely staff. Very clean and well presented rooms. Lovely view to raffles over the pool and to the esplanade. Very close to a train station and not to far to walk to a lot of places. The young man at checkin was very attentive and helpful. He offered me a room that was available at 6am rather than me having to wait to 2pm. Only $30 per night to upgrade which after getting off an overnight flight was perfect for me. Very helpful with suggestions of places to visit in Singapore.

title: Great Services
desc: A small boutique hotel with great personalised services. Offered apple tv device in the room but for some reason doesn't seem to be working for my room for airplay function. No free movies in the room like what Mandarin Orchard hotel is offering but there is option to buy movies on apple tv platform.

title: Not recommended for those looking for a small luxury hotel
desc: Location is good. It's next to Raffles Hotel, and within a walking distance from MRT City Hall station. But that's the only thing I liked about this hotel. Staff attitude at this hotel was the worst among all the hotels I've ever stayed in Singapore. They don't seem to know how to say hello, thank you and goodbye. This is particularly so when they serve Asian customers. Some of its staff don't even have an eye contact with the customers during the whole process of check-in/check-out. Another thing I felt very uncomfortable was the air conditioning. The air flows directly towards the bed (and towards your face!) You might feel that this hotel looks nice if you look at the photos they post on their official website, but those are too good. You might be disappointed upon

title: Great stay in Singapore
desc: The hotel has a calm atmosphere, and have stylish interior. It is fresh and modern and have good location. The service provided by the staff were beyond my expectation. All from the welcoming to the check out. Everybody I talked to had the same attitude and I got especially good support from Vee and Amalina during my check-out. The hotel has a nice roof top bar with infinity pool. The breakfast has a lot of good choices. Can easily be recomended.

title: Wonderful experience at Naumi
desc: The manager, Michelle, was a wealth of information and spent lots of time helping us navigate Singapore. She set the bar very high for customer service. She even bought us a piece of the local cake to take with us when we left. Love her!

title: Amazing stay Amazing City
desc: One of the best boutique hotels I've ever stayed in. The views from the pool/bar are amazing, and a great way to unwind after a day in the city. We were there for the grand prix, and you can even see most of the circuit (or make it out) from the infinity pool. The staff are friendly and attentive, they'll remember where you went for the day when you return and ask you about it, and no task is too big. The Indian food is great, and you can eat up by the tables in the pool area. The only thing I would say, is they rent out the pool area for parties, which means guests can not use it, it would be good if the hotel advised of this when booking - we were there for several nights, so it didn't really bother us, but if you were only there one or two, it would be annoying if you

title: top choice
desc: Naumi is one of my favourite hotel worldwide and it is a big deal as I am spending every second weeks in a hotel all over the world. The design of the rooms are stylish, comfortable and sexy, the staff is super kind and attentive, the rooftop pool is amazing. As it is not a huge impersonal 5 star hotel you get a much cosier feeling during the stay. So many details which makes it special.

title: Lovely boutique hotel in the heart of Singapore
desc: Great boutique hotel in the heart of SIngapore right next to Raffles. What I really enjoyed was that although the room sizes are not big, they have designed it in such a way that it still feels spacious. Very helpful staff at check-in as well as breakfast where they ensured I had a pleasant stay. My only constructive criticism I would offer is that the towels in the room are too thin and hence not soft enough.

title: Great hotel, great view, everything you need
desc: This is a fabulous hotel that has everything you need. Beds are super comfy, GREAT rooftop pool and view of the city. The location is easy to get to everything and whilst the rooms are small they have a luxury feel to them and you won't spend long in your room in Singapore anyway! Love the efficiency and layout of the room

title: A Ten Story Hotel with a Friendly Local Feel
desc: Staff were very friendly, helpful and knowledgeable on a number of occasions. The comfort of the Beds, Air conditioning and Sound proofing was exactly what we were looking for on our two day stop over from Europe. The open plan bathroom hand basin (Habitat Room ) was unexpected and there was insufficient hanging place for towels. The slide out 'Bar' has to be completely closed to extinguish its built in light (at night). A switch would have been easier. The Restaurant offering was somewhat pedestrian, however many local restaurants exist within 150 metres. The room top pool offers good views of the city and is a pleasant place to relax.

title: great hoeel, great location
desc: a lovely hidden hotel with great staff, excellent rooms and a very friendly vibe. we were passing through for a couple of days and the place was a haven amidst the heat and hectic nature of the city. loved the rooms, nice features, good showers and the 'night light' facility worked a treat to use the loo during the night!!

title: Grand Prix weekend
desc: On the whole very pleased with our stay and like the room very much. We do feel however that the breakfast wasn't as good as we thought it would be. We didn't feel there was enough choice for the 25 dollars charged so we only had breakfast twice. We would have preferred to eat breakfast at the hotel but didn't !! We didn't feel the service by the pool was very good either? The bar person wasn't around half the time and wasn't very helpful when trying to choose a drink. We only went there a couple of evenings but again that was because of the poor service? The only other thing we thought was very disappointing was the facility offered to freshen up on our last day??? It was no more than a toilet with a shower in it? I thought we could have been offered a late checkout which we

title: Stylish location with excellent service
desc: The Naumi hotel is located near MRT City Hotel next to the Raffles Hotel. The MRT is a 10 minutes walk. The location itself is quite nice as many places can be reached by walking. There is a really nice shopping center Raffles City, several nice bars and restaurant in the street und to the Marina Bay it is also around 15 minutes to go. The rooms are suited very stylish. The bathroom has a glass wall which gets intransparent by a switch. On the top floor is a bar with an infinity pool and a great view over Marina Bay , Raffles Hotel and the Singapore Skyline. The breakfast is complete and good, the room the optically and physically rather cold. What I missed from another stay in Singapore is a free mobile internet router. Remote data plans are expensive in Singapore. The

title: Very Good Hotel
desc: Stayed here prior to going on a Royal Caribbean Cruise. Friendly staff and excellent rooms. Pool is on the small size but still adequate. Good location with some bars and restaurants nearby if you don’t fancy anything in the hotel.

title: EXCELLENT
desc: Love to stay in the Hotel, everybody was very nice and polite, the room was awesome and the service great. the staff was very well informed so I was able to ask anything regarding the city and surroundings in case of doubt.

title: A great place
desc: We followed an invitation to a wedding party. Everything was neatly arranged, very friendly, on the spot service, very helpful on request. Late check out was no problem. Offer to have a shower in the pool area before departure. Looking forward to our next stay at Naumi!

title: Very personal little first class hotel
desc: Very personal and good service. Your are somebody in this Hotel. Fantastic Infinity Pool with view to the Business district in Singapore Town down! Food good at very reasonable price. Special: Mini-Bar "no extra cost" whatever you take out!! Everyday new refill!

title: Fantastic Naumi Hotel and great location
