desc: Having stayed here for business i found the site to be local to just about everything, shops food bars and We Work offices. Great hotel with lots of inclusion in the room and fridges. Roof top pool is fantastic place to work or just chill. Auto blind for night time put the room in complete darkenss.

title: Delightful
desc: We stayed in the hotel for 2 nights in the habitat room. The hotel is very centrally located and is compact. Our room had a small window but was very well and efficiently designed. All was available in only a rather small area. Well done! Breakfast is downstairs in the lobby/restaurant/bar. Good quality and enough choices. Around the corner is the famous Raffles hotel. Only a few hundred meters walk is the central busstop for Big Bus tours with 4 routes around Singapore. Since our flight was really late at night we asked reception for a late check out. For SGD150.00 this could be arranged until 6pm or SGD230.00 for an extra night. We ended up booking an extra night via booking.com as the rate there was better than in the hotel.... we needed a 9pm checkout. With still rooms

title: Good stay
desc: We stayed for three nights in Singapore before continuing on to the rest of our three week trip in Asia. This was our first time in Singapore. We loved the city, the culture, and the amazing food. Our stay was made more enjoyable by having a great hotel. The location is close to the MRT, which we took to get everywhere. The staff are friendly and always ready to assist you. Although the room we had was a bit small, it was clean and had a modern feel. We didn’t try the food at the restaurant because there is so much awesome food everywhere outside, but we did enjoy a few glasses of wine at the bar during their happy hour. We definitely recommend this small boutique hotel, and would return if we come to Singapore again. Thanks to all the staff members for providing a

title: Awesome stay in this cute hotel
desc: Husband and I went on a short stay in Singapore and stayed at Naumi hotel. First I should say this location is perfect esp if you like to eat, like us😋 The area is crawling with a lot of food options and of course bars not to mention the close proximity to hawker centers. The hotel itself although the rooms are small, it is very well maintained. Did I mentioned that I loved the infused water station they have in the lobby? Phenomenal! Talking about being Green(passionate about saving the environment and waste reduction), this hotel eliminate the use of bottled water which is great 👍🏼but considering how some guests (like me since I got sick from drinking water from one big chain hotel) can be always skeptical about potable water cleanliness I would maybe suggest put up a

title: Boutique Hotel in heart of City
desc: If you are looking for a hotel which pays attention to your needs then Naumi is the one. Compared to most hotels in City Hall area in Singapore, the price is reasonable, with good facilities and an amazing rooftop swimming pool for chilling out. The rooms are larger than usual and also has good amenities. Ground floor Indian cuisine restaurant also serves delicious authentic Indian Fusion food. There are also small snacks which guests can take from the reception area throughout the day.

title: Lovely, comfortable stay. Highly recommend
desc: Some highlights of my recent 6 night stay. I had a quiet, comfortable room on the 9th floor. Very comfortable bedding. AirCon was easy to operate and kept the room quite comfortable. Water pressure in walk in shower is awesome. Amenity drawer contains comb, toothbrush, razor and shaving cream, shower cap. Drinks in minibar are replenished daily, snacks are offered once and not replenished. Nespresso machine was quite convenient. Delicious coffee. The hotel pool area offers a nice view of the city skyline. Lovely spending time in the infinity pool to cool off or take a nap in one of the lounge chairs. Large towels are available at the pool. Very relaxing space (during the day). Not sure about nights. There were several little convenient touches that really set this hotel apart

title: Choose this hotel
desc: We stayed here for three nights and can highly recommend this hotel. We arrived early after a long flight and our check in was available after an hour. We waited on the pool deck and were given complimentary fizz due to it being our anniversary. The infinity pool view was excellent. Our room was on the seventh floor. Very modern, very clean. Absolutely no complaints. The breakfast was very good, lots of healthy options. The whole ambience was good. Staff extremely professional and friendly. On departure we were given a small gift which we thought was a lovely touch. Would thoroughly recommend this hotel. Very central, intimate, clean, eco, decorated to an extremely high standard. Would stay again if we return to Singapore.

title: Great Hotel
desc: Such a great find this hotel. Right next door to Raffles and not far from everything that we wanted to see and do on our short visit to Singapore. The staff were very friendly and helpful and the room was very clean with a complimentary minibar. The rooftop bar and pool was perfect with a wonderful view over Singapore. Definitely stay here on our next visit.

title: Amazing stay
desc: We had a lovely stay here for four nights. The room was lovely, clean and refreshing and I really appreciated the hospitality shown to us. I experienced no issues during my stay and would not hesitate to stay here again.

title: Recommend by acquaintance
desc: A neighbour recommended this hotel for the view from the pool deck which is impressive (if you think a view is the most important aspect of a hotel). The Naumi Hotel is quite tired and in need of some tender love and care. Our room (themed room, Gabrielle) was a good size and quite clean. None of the cupboard doors close anymore, and the decor is quite twee instead of the Chic they were trying for. The wet room shower/bath leaks into the main bedroom room, there is a smell of drain and the hot water is warm at best so didn’t even attempt a bath. The service was good in general, breakfast was fresh although limited in options. As per all of Singapore the drinks are very expensive and finish early 10:30 or 11. The pool bar has no staff during the day and you are supposed to call

title: Gem of a boutique contemporary hotel
desc: Naumi Singapore is adjacent to Raffles in Seah Street. If you don't want the hustle and bustle of a major hotel and you do want modern fixtures and extremely attentive staff, then this is the hotel to choose. From the 10th floor outdoor infinity pool to the multi-purpose bar/lounge and dining area on the ground floor, there was nothing that we didn't like. Room numbers are cleverly mounted in the floor and there are lots of cute lines about the hotel such as "I Know You Want It" as you get off the elevator for your room and "where should I hide " for the cleverly concealed bathroom

title: VIOLATED
desc: In less than an hour AFTER I was checked in and brought to my room, a staff barged in without knocking or prior permission when I was less than decent. On top of that, he stuck his head in the second time to look before I screamed for him to get out!!! He had the audacity to ring the bell and knock on the door then? So am I suppose to pull out the red carpet for an intruder?! Naumi, you boast about being a boutique luxury hotel. You have prepared your room with all the physical items a guest can enjoy. But as a solo female traveler, the single most important thing that is valued and sought after is SAFETY. Words cannot describe the violation I felt at your hotel. How you handled the situation after was even less than acceptable. The fact that I paid S$500 for the room and have

title: Perfect
desc: Great little hotel close to metro and attractions. Staff are super helpful. I ordered a late night pizza and front desk tried to bring it to our room, searched for us then finally found us at the pool. Rooms are compact but super efficient. The magic glass on the shower wall is cool. The roof top pool is exactly what you need to relax in after a big day on the town. The view is spectacular from up there. Very well run establishment. Continue the good work.

title: Excellent stay in Singapore
desc: Lovely hotel. We arrived at 1am and hotel staff were so friendly and helpful. Our room was quite small but all we needed for 2 nights. Rooms are very modern and clean! Breakfast was average as didn't have a huge selection. Boyfriend got eggs every morning, but no bacon / sausages. The rooftop pool area was perfect. Lots of seating and incredible views! Location was excellent, easy to walk everywhere. Our flight home wasn't until middnight and we were unable to check out late without paying a full night rate which was annoying, but we stayed around the pool area and used hotel facilities to shower which was fine.

title: Lovely stay, great room.
desc: We enjoyed a short stay in January, only a 3 night stopover, but staying at this lovely hotel added greatly to our time in Singapore. The receptionist showed us to our room, and helped with the bags. We had a large modern room, with all the trappings of a boutique hotel. Drinks in the mini bar, soft ones free. Electric blinds and privacy glass. Eat in for one night, and had a well prepared indian style meal. Breakfasts were good and worthwhile. The pool had lovely views over the lights of Singapore, and the friendly barman made us cocktails every night. Lovely place to sit, even if you dont want to swim. Good location, plentiful restaurants around. Its right next door to Raffles, go and enjoy a Singapore Sling. The metro is about 5 minutes walk away. Hotel was spotless, well

title: Good location for visiting Singapore service different.
desc: Good central location for a citytrip to Singapore. However there are more good options. Nice rooms, nice rooftop/ view over the city. Rooms are rather small. Service different: one person is very service minded other rather cool. If you have a late flight no flexibility other then to pay (for 6 hours half dayprice!!!). Alternative: They offer then only the poor option to shower in a toilet near the swimmingpool. I don't think that's very customer friendly.

title: You’ll love this great boutique hotel
desc: Just returned from our trip to Singapore with my wife and we have nothing but good words to say for this great hotel located near the MRT on City Link Room (5mins on foot).The room was always clean,had a great feel and temperature,had always clean sheets and fresh towels in place along with new shampoos and shower gels and the complimentary mini bar always full.The staff was very polite and helpful (as all Singaporians that we encountered). Don’t forget to visit the rooftop with the bar and the infinity pool for a quick swim and the breathtaking view. If we come back to Singapore we’ll definitely visit again this great hotel!

title: Short stay after cruise
desc: Absolutely loved this place, on check in and check out the staff where great, and so polite., to the room, which was lovely decorated and kitted out, then the pool which is something else, in a great location too. If I return to singapore, I will return to the Naumi.

title: Great little hotel. Lovely staff.
desc: I’ve previously stayed in the Swissotel and the Fairmont in the same area but much preferred this hotel. It’s smaller and had a boutique feel to it. The staff are really friendly and helpful and the rooms are spotlessly clean and chic. Free snacks and mini bar are a really nice touch. Great location too.

title: Good hotel generally, with good service, but over designed room very irritating when jet-lagged
desc: Room had only light switches one side of bed, very difficult to operate in dark. "Innovative?!" wash basin, and coffee bar arrangements, unnecessary and difficult to use. This spoilt and otherwise perfectly good hotel

title: Gem of a hotel -- friendly staff, comfortable, great amenities
desc: This is one of my favourite boutique hotels across the globe -- I had the best experience with the staff, watched the NYE fireworks from the rooftop, did yoga by the pool, and felt cared for and supported by everyone. Small touches matter -- e.g., I asked about where to eat, and Michelle took me by the hand down the street and ordered a typical meal for me; I was going for a run and Shan found me a reusable water bottle to take with me. All of the staff were great, but Michelle stands out as one of the most helpful and kind staff members I've encountered anywhere. Thanks to everyone!

title: Disappointed
desc: The hotel has the small luxury hotels certificate, but it is far far from the expected quality. The towels are as a sheet of paper, nobody helps with the bags, the rooms are very small, etc. Not worth it!

title: Great location and friendly team
desc: We selected the small naumi hotel because its a great location right in the centre and walking distance to the centre areas of the city.Right next to Raffles Hotel. We had the small but well supplied habitat type room. Hotel is modern, with some quirky decoration , quite and very well managed overall Could do betters? -well the towels while plentiful were a bit thin and in need of replacement, and the breakfast was adequate and nothing special. Nice small roof top pool and relaxation area. Helpful team on reception.

title: Friendly Hotel in a great location
desc: Very friendly hotel that is extremely well kept. Staff are so helpful and friendly, they are more than willing to help with advice and suggestions that will make sure you get the best out of your visit to Singapore. Check in was easy but a little long, we did arrive very early! Our room was ready and we were relieved that we were shown straight to it. Rooms are vey modern and make the most of a very small space. All ideal for a short stay. Not a great deal of choice at breakfast but all good quality, evening meal was excellent, some of the best Indian food we have tasted. Bar is limited and service not great but there are alternatives right next door. All in all a good stay in an ideally located hotel for central Singapore

title: Great location,modern room
desc: Naumi located in city centre,well furnished room with amenities. Rooftop pool view is awesome. No restaurant in premise however there were many bars and restaurants nearby within walking distance. Would love to visit Naumi again.

title: Loved this boutique hotel in Singapore!
desc: Lovely, modern boutique hotel right next to Raffles in Singapore. The rooftop pool and the view of the city from the pool were to die for! Great value for the price. Walking distance to the harbor and most attractions. Very safe city.

title: Christmas staycation 2020
desc: Staff here is friendly and helpful! Hotel is chic and artistic. They have a reactive portrait where you clap your hands the birds in the portrait will fly off. Cool stuff! We stayed at the Oasis room with a perfect view of city hall and Jw Marriott. They do have another breath taking view at the roof top on the 10th floor where you can see across the lid up raffles place with a magnificent bird’s eye view. Worth taking pictures and a romantic view in the night. The interior of the room is cosy and the bath tub big enough for 2 adults or 3 kids. Likewise, it is in the heart of north bridge road which is walkable distance to bugis or city hall. There are so many cafe right at at your door step along Seah or Purvis St. If you have cravings for Singapore chicken rice, there

title: Wonderful stay and excellent staff
desc: We had a wonderful stay at Naumi. It was a return stay for us and it was for a special occasion. The staff (Yunis and Shalini) were both superb and both responded to our queries quickly in the lead up and during our stay. Highly recommend to couples looking for a stay in the centre of town. Thank you again! Scott

title: Good clean rooms and a fantastic location
desc: Stayed in the Habitat Room for a 1 night staycation! The check-in process was fast and the room was really clean. Complimentary drinks in the fridge and coffee/tea was provided. Unfortunately the roof-top pool bar isn't open in the evening due to COVID restrictions but the pool was good and the views fantastic! The locality is great as well, with lots of dining options and near City Hall.

title: Thank you Naumi for helping me to start a new chapter in my life
desc: It was one of the best decision to have chosen Naumi Hotel as a place for a staycation for many reasons: lovely and helpful manager and staff; hotel centralised with many good food around; spacious clean room with a big bath tub; amazing experience at the rooftop pool. I had troubles finding a good place to propose to my fiancée until I saw the room at Naumi Hotel and I knew I had found the right place. Again, I like to thank Naumi Hotel for giving me a wonderful start in a new chapter in my life and, the lovely and thoughtful hand-written card~

title: Great boutique hotel stay in the city
desc: Nice boutique hotel located in the city centre , opposite raffles hotels and near Fairmont and Swissotel Stanford. The hotel has 8 floors of rooms (total 10 floors). With the main floor , as reception and top floor - swimming pool. Upon check in , given an option for an upgrade to an oasis room from a habitat room. The oasis room comes with a bath tub. As it’s a low level room (209), there’s not much of a view. Can request for a higher level room upon availability. Great view at the swimming pool too. Great hospitality services shown throughout the stay.

title: Is it luxury?
desc: Hotel is classified as luxury and we stayed the weekend to find out. Would not class it luxury for us. Hotel common areas looks nice with fancy decor, but some parts of the room could do some touch up. Rooms are not well sound proof, you can hear loud talking, shouting and noises coming from corridor. Hotel is no full service, no restaurants or room service now, we were told they will soon to have. Think the price here is almost the same as other 5 star hotel so for the price and what we got, think not really worth. What was really nice here that might not be found in other chains is the personalize service. First time we get check in sitting down with ice tea, then even walked all the way inside the room like vip. We appreciate and enjoy the chit chat, good job to Jeffrey.

title: Amazing Stay!
desc: This is my second stay with Naumi Hotel. I picked it because of the location as it is centralised, so it’s nearby to town! The mini bar is complimentary. The room is beautiful and cosy. I requested for a room at the highest floor (level 9) and the view was marvellous! The pool area was nice too. However, the bar was closed while I was there but that’s okay. The only downside was the WIFI and the TV. The WIFI’s strength was okay, but if you’re streaming movies/TV shows, it may take some to buffer. As for the TV, I experienced a laggy output but I think that’s because my device was too far away from the Apple TV. Other than that, the service was excellent. Will I come back? Definitely. The staffs there are also very accommodating and warm.

title: Nice Staycation
desc: Booked a weekend stay, when travelling is impossible now, this is good enough. Wowed by the artistic decor of the hotel once entered, warmly welcomed by a gentleman, Jeffrey, who served us a refreshing drink and proceeded to complete the paperwork. Once done, he walked us to the room while introducing the stylish, hippie hotel, and around the area (we are locals but we are not familiar with this area). We were showed around the room, it was nice and even came with free drinks and snacks. Unfortunately the hotel had no restaurants, but we were recommended the many food options nearby. Did not use the pool but went to checked it out, it was quite a nice view. Overall it was a relaxing and enjoyable stay, impressive staff service, nice hotel, good location.

title: Resplendent yet Underrated, Best Hotel Experience
desc: My bf planned a surprise birthday staycation for me during the dates 10 - 12 March (3D2N). It was an amazing set-up and the event was a success. After the adrenaline died off after seeing the pretty surprise being pulled off, I finally basked in the beauty of the room. The designer room (CC) was curated in detail; everything from the time you step in to the end of the room tour was as though it was intentional. Instead of the typical hotel room whose pathway is just a straight line (door -> bathroom -> bed), this was a beautiful tour that was almost like a spacious roundabout. From the moment you entered the door, straight ahead was the toilet -> bathroom, turn the corner and there was the gigantic bed sitting in the middle facing a large-screen TV backed against automatic

title: Charming & Chill respite in the City
desc: We were initially drawn & attracted to the rooftop pool when we made the booking. However, the Naumi experience was extended beyond that. Greeted by charming hosts, we were orientated to the distinguishing qualities of this Uber chill hotel. Ranging from the chic lounge, the talking-point art pieces to the quirky offerings in the room, we felt spoilt by the impeccable service. The exceedingly beautiful skyline view from the pool was beyond expectation. Truly, Naumi exudes undisputed charm & chill in the heart of Singapore City.

title: Beautiful hotel and excellent service.
desc: Enjoyed our 1 night stay in designer room. Michelle was super friendly that show us around our room. When we were checking out, she still introduced us the art pieces that were displayed at the hotel lobby. We will be back again.

title: Staycation Review
desc: My wife and I just did a staycation at Naumi Hotel from Mar 8- 9 to celebrate her bday. We were shown genuine warmth and hospitality throughout the stay and the staff personally bought some pastries and a slice of chocolate cake to celebrate my wife bday. Truly a memorable experience. If you are looking for a nice and cosy hotel in the heart of the city area (10-15 mins walk to suntec city and bugis), and warmth hospitality with a infinity pool view then look no further. Naumi Hotel will definitely be one of your go to hotel.

title: Great hotel for staycation
desc: My husband very enjoyed with the rooftop swimming pool. The swimming pool has an amazing view facing towards the city area. I like the bathtub in the room, it is huge and comfortable. The snacks and drinks in the fridge are free to enjoy. A very quiet hotel in the city but affordable price.

title: Friendly Staff, Pool with Nice View
desc: We booked a 4d3n stay in the Oasis Room at Naumi Singapore for a local honeymoon. What pulled us to try Naumi was the pool view as well as the approach taken to decorate the hotel (lots of artwork integrated into the hotel's design). Me and my wife really enjoyed our stay. We could feel the welcoming and friendly spirit of the staff members the moment we stepped in to the hotel all the way until our check-out and this was really what stood out during our stay at Naumi. We were glad that we were able to get the pool to ourselves during this time to enjoy the view together. The Oasis was nice; although we did note that the toilet door was a little scuffed, we felt it didn't detract from the experience in the room.

title: Worst Experience ever
desc: Literally the worst hotel experience of my life. We booked a staycation here on 3rd April. Arrived on time for check in and was told to wait in the hotel lobby. Subsequently waited 3 hours because they had overbooked and were still cleaning and preparing rooms. I think there were people there who waited >5 hours and still had not gotten a room. In the end we gave up and left with the assurance from the hotel staff that they would provide a full refund including vouchers used. It has been 3 months since and I have called and emailed them multiple times without a single reply. I don't understand how this place is so highly rated when they display such unprofessional and borderline illegal service. Please spend your money anywhere else.

title: Staycation @ Naumi Hotel
desc: A clean & well maintained boutique style hotel in the midst of the city. Room was smaller than we had expected but was cosy & functional enough - importantly we had a very good night's sleep on the "5-star" hotel bed that comes with high quality bed linen that is so comfortable. The reception staff were friendly, efficient & always made us feel welcome whenever we stepped into the lobby The swimming pool located at the top floor is like a mini "infinity pool" with a superb view of the city. A nice place to chill out in the evening. The hotel is within walking distance of good food all around from simple local coffeeshop fare like Hainanese chicken rice to tacos, all day breakfast, Thai, Japanese, Italian to Michelin star fine dining restaurant. We were also able to re-discover

title: Excellent Staff Service, Artistic Decor, Elegant and Luxurious
desc: On arrival, we were directed to chill out at the hotel lobby. We were served homemade daily tea(enjoyed the apple citrus peppermint tea) while they prepare our documents and scanned our identification documents. No need to queue up or stand around while you wait. The habitat room was big even for their smallest room type. Thanks for the complimentary bar snacks, we enjoyed it. We had to make a booking for the pool sessions because of the Covid 19 situations, and we managed to secure ourselves the 7.15 slot. The night city view in the infinity pool was amazing and unblock that I wish we took photos of. The room service was excellent. We received quick responses and the staff was always smiling. We got water, masks and some utensils to have our delivered food cause their

title: If you are looking for a bath tub, this is not the place
desc: The Naumi staff are lovely. But we chose Naumi for a staycation because the apartment we live in does not have a bath tub - so we booked the Eden & Nirwana room, which we could see from the photos has a great big lovely round bath tub. But there were two serious problems with the room: one was that the a/c wasn’t working properly (deal-breaker - I need a/c to sleep), and the other was that the hot water tank for the room is much too small for the tub. Michelle at the front desk was great - she acknowledged the issue with the hot water, sent someone to check out the a/c, and offered us the Gabrielle & Camilla room, which has a smaller tub. It is also a significantly smaller room, is right above Seah and is therefore noisier, and does not have the great reading chair that’s in

title: Comfortable room
desc: The service is definitely excellent. There are many restaurants around the hotel which are all within a 5-min walk. The bed in the room is cozy. The lobby in the hotel is quiet and suitable for working.

title: Genuine service amidst chaos
desc: Imagine being all excited for a staycation, but arriving at the hotel to a lobby full of guests, having to wait hours for your room... it was the long weekend, but for whatever reason we think it is unacceptable to wait hours to check in.... this should be a one star review if not for the genuine service of one staff jerry/jeffrey...we were frustrated, but could not be more frustrated when he was being so apologetic for the problem he probably was not responsible for...he explained us the situation and kept checking back on what he could do for us...When our room was finally ready and a lady walk us to the lift, he ran over and thanked us for being patient and apologies once again...seriously we were touched by the service, normally we don't write reviews but this time we think

title: Fun Escape From The City
desc: This small hotel is a perfect hideaway from the city life! Lobby was quiet and nice when we walked in. Syakir invited us to have a seat and served us a refreshing cuppa tea while he went through the registration. In front of the lifts there are fun art pieces that’s entertaining! Syakir walked us to our room and he showed us everything in there. Minibar selection is generous! Bathtub in the room is love! I could watch TV and have a drink in there as well. Exclusive poolside vibes even though there was another couple up there when we went up. Michelle brought us pool towels and served us 2 glasses of ice cold lemon water. It’s a nice touch of service. We’ll definitely come back on our next break!

title: Most recommended hotel!
desc: This is the perfect hotel for a weekend getaway in the city. Naumi offers everything you need if you don’t feel like venturing out. A luxury hotel at an affordable price. Would truly recommend this hotel to everyone. Kudos to Michelle and her team for the awesome customer service. They were helpful, thoughtful and very forthcoming. Truly a team that shows pride and dedication in customer service. On a busy Saturday evening, the check-in was smooth even though there were many people in the lobby. The room was clean and had very great amenities. Good variety of minibar snacks and drinks provided. Even during check out, Michelle and team were very engaging. The pool bar attendant, Eddy, provided outstanding service. He brought us 2 buckets of ice without us asking for it when we

title: Another Great Stay!
desc: Prior to arriving at the hotel, we received a pleasant welcoming email to notify us of our checking in details. The process of checking in could not have been any better without the help of the couthy staff, Michelle. She seated us while she processed the check-in swiftly. The comfy bed and the quiet environment allowed us to have our tranquil rest. Another finest moment was the view of the pool at Cloud 9 which helps to alleviate the stress that every Singaporean had faced from not travelling. We will definitely return back to Naumi Hotel again!!!

title: A very disappointing staycation
desc: I was looking forward to a great stay at Naumi... But troubles started the moment I step into the hotel. The official check-in time was 2pm. I arrived around 4pm and found the lobby full of guests (easily at least 15 groups of people) waiting to be check-in. We approach the counter staff and she told us that they were busy and to take a seat. After patiently waiting for an hour, the staff presumed that we had book the oasis room and told us that the oasis room would be ready soon. I was shocked, becoz I did not book that category of room and went to clarify. I showed her my booking and she apologize for mistaking us as another guests. Then we continue our waiting game... The check-in staff pass by a few times and told us she will be back shortly... After 2 hours of

title: Chill out staycay
desc: Such good service. So different from the other places i have stayed. Easily accessible. We had someone bring us all the way to our room and show us around. They even brought my pizza delivery up. They go all the way in ensuring we have a good time. The complimentary mini bar is a big plus. Which hotel even has complimentary mini bar nowadays when they can charge exorbitant prices for the cans of drinks. Will definitely return! I think i found my new fav!

title: Must stay!!!
desc: If you want to find a place of happiness and touch ,please come here.😄Of caurse,if you are as lucky as me, you must meet this specialist.Her name is Viri Kaur !You will never regret it!😄😄😄🎉🎉🎉The hotel is full of artistic atmosphere,making people feel like entering an international art gallery.

title: A second home to none
desc: This was my second time in the hotel and it was adhoc booking due to its attractive pricing and yet exceptional 5 star services.It’s winning point is definitely its location, pool and importantly the quality of bed and sheets and duvet that allows me to sleep like a baby and it definitely beats the Westin heavenly king bed .Having being a flight attendant for last 15 years, my home is normally the luxurious 5 star hotels. And with the current situation and time off from work, I have been doing lots of staycations with all the leading Brand’s and this definitely have to be my HOME away from home. I booked the Habitat Room as compared to the previous Oasis Room. The habitat room surprised me with all the space saving features like the mini bar and the study table, not forgetting

title: 5* for the price
desc: Great boutique hotel with a really personal vibe. Minibar was great. The tv’s had netflix which was cool. The pool was lovely with a cool view. The outside of the building was also really cool. The rooms were a little on the small side but 5* for what we paid.

title: Great staycation experience for birthday
desc: Would like to thank Jeffery Fern for his amazing service and his recommendation to the Andy Warhol themed room. Highly recommended! It was very enjoyable and relaxing. great service and experience all around!!

title: Staycation
desc: Nice staycation at a stylish boutique hotel, felt safe enough as hotel seems to take covid measures seriously with registration papers and pool booking. D team is nice and friendly, Jeffrey stood out with his great service, showing us to the room with tour of features and ammenties. Love the personal touch in seevice. Overal is a different experience of hotel that is very pleasant and will recomend.

title: Fantabulous!
desc: Really enjoyed our stay at naomi. We booked the stay in adv, but suay suay announced covid heightened alert, decided to still stay and just relax. Check in is fast and easy. staff Mr Jeff is very professional in his work, sharing with us options we can dabao to room to eat, tried his recommended coffeeshop just 1 min from hotel and is very nice. We really enjoyed convo with him everytime we go out or come back. Some things we talk about incl covid, hotels sure kena hard. He told us to give encouragement to his team by writing review: stay strong and keep going naomi team, good job so far! Other things we talk about fashion, I like his dress style very stylish clothes, he told me bought from Bangkok. Very match with the stylish lobby. During stay we spend most time in room, dabao

title: Best staycay ever at the best hotel
desc: Have always seen great reviews of Naumi hotel and it is true the hotel is not only splendid n the service is beyond excellent. Upon checking in, we were seated and given a drink instead of having to queue and stand in line. The hotel lobby was sleek and beautiful. Our forms were even given to us at our seat. Jeffrey showed us up to our rm which is a first in my life and showed us the room functions as well. All of the staff showed exceptional service which exceeded my expectations. The room was extremely comfortable and gorgeous. The infinity pool showcased the beautiful city landscape as well in day and night. I could go on about how awesome this hotel is, but the point is that Naumi Hotel made my staycay extremely pleasant and unforgettable. Thanks Viri for asking us how was

title: Enjoyable!
desc: Everything was nice! Personally brought me up to the room and then did a detailed introduction on the amenities. Room was comfortable and I really like the bed. They were using Samung TV which allow me to connect to my phone. Spoilt for choice for dining options around the hotel. Accessible and near to the MRT.

title: Cozy Luxury
desc: A quaint hotel near Suntec & Raffles City. We had a short staycation during our ROM week and were pleasantly surprised at the warm attentiveness of the staff. Great view at the pool at night! Our room was comfortable albeit slightly smaller than expected. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay.

title: Great hotel with Excellent Service!
desc: Booked a staycay with Naumi and tried my luck on having my wedding proposal at the hotel. Not only did I get a chance to have my event at their signature Cloud9 infinity pool, the staff also helped to setup the venue for me! Many thanks to Michelle and her team who stayed till 9pm to help me make my event a very memorable one, especially with the magnificent views as my phototaking backdrop! Hotel room was great too! Whole stay at Naumi was more than just pleasant! Would highly recommend the place and would definitely come back to stay in future!

title: Staycay
desc: I had a really enjoyable stay with my family here. The room is comfortable, and location is good as there are lots of food around. The staff were really friendly and helpful. What I enjoyed the most was chilling at the pool deck at night. Great view and good ambience. Really recommend this place!

title: Awesome!
desc: Everything is amazing from the moment that you make your reservation until you end your stay at this marvelous Hotel that really just makes you feel like it’s your place! The team, room, facilities are just great!!! My first option always!!! Thanks Naumi Team

title: Birthday Staycay
desc: The staffs were very helpful and warm in welcoming me during my birthday stay with them. Lisa personally guided me to my room, gave me a room tour and explained how to use everything from A to Z. Shakir was prompt in helping me check in and gave me a friendly goodbye, alongside Eunice who helped with the check out. As I was there to celebrate my birthday, since I couldn’t travel out due to C-19, I didn’t regret spending the night at Naumi. I took the birthday package which was set up for me when I came back from dinner. The bed was decorated with petals in the form of a cake, and a slice of chocolate and candle and Presecco accompanied this arrangement. They even gave me the green light to use the pool despite it being after swimming hours, so I got the pool to myself.

title: Extraordinary.....
desc: Where do I start... Everything is perfection. The rooms, the pool. But most of all, the hospitality of the staff here that makes all the difference. Its almost like an extended family in a beautiful setting. Michelle, Aslinda, Jefferey and of course the wonder Miss Viri, thank you from the bottom of my heart for making this stay a beautiful one. The smile and small conversations we had at the lobby added to the whole experience. The Coco Chanel room is exquisite and so tastefully done and the Instagram worthy shots are just endless here. You have got a new fan here and definitely will be coming back for the Andy Warhol room.... Once again, thank you... Aidil

title: ...Absolutely Fabulous...
desc: Would like to thank Jefferey and his staff (in particular, the 2 cleaning ladies) for ensuring that my stay was a pleasant one. Even though there were some minor hiccups initially, they went the extra mile by ensuring everything went smoothly after. From accommodating to adhoc requests and constantly checking, they really made it an enjoyable one. Patio room was dope. Everything you could ask for: King Sized Bed, Apple TV, Minibar, Snacks galore and the bedsheets.... OMG!!! Rooftop: Simply stunning. Infinity pool and unblocked views of the city. Can't ask for anything more!! Looking forward to my next stay there, especially with all the new and attractive promotions and the opening of the new restaurant, Florian. Once again, well done to Jefferey and his team for

title: Naumi Birthday Celebration
desc: OMG!! we just checked in, and yet we are already inlove with Naumi! We book Eden and Nirwana room, and it's super duper nice! We've been to alot of Hotels in Singapore, but i can say that Naumi is the best!! Jane's service is amazing, she is very jolly, friendly, enthusiastic and genuine. She send us to our room and explained everything with a smile and passion! Love her, Jane is the best! Naumi is amazing, looking forward to our next stay already 🤩

title: Wonderful and welcoming stay!
desc: I was there for a solo-cation. It was a wonderful stay! I stayed in the habitat room. It was spacious with all the basic amenities. Loved the cute messages on the toiletries. Would like to specially appreciate the front desk staff Jane! She was absolutely welcoming with a cheery smile and always willing to help. She helped me to my room and even gave a mini tour. The swimming pool was very cozy too. Overall, a wonderful stay!

title: Great service since pre arrival!
desc: There is 1 staff I would like to thank for making the surprise birthday staycation for my partner a success! Jeffery from Reservation Department whom I did not get to meet personally during my stay, attended to my phone and email enquiry about making a reservation and planning the surprise. He patiently explained the different category of rooms, and advised how I could go about using my SRV. Basised on his recomendation which I liked the idea of, Jeffery arranged a upgrade to Oasis room at a reasonable price and even arranged a slice of free cake. I really appreciate the effort he made going the extra mile for my plan. The room is beautiful and worth the extra cost, hotel offers a unique experience for staycation. Staff were also all friendly, they give you a nice room tour.

title: Lovely hotel
desc: Great ambience and excellent customer service. Special mention to Jeffery who responded promptly to our enquires prior to our stay and for assisting us throughout our stay to ensure that everything was going well. He even went above and beyond by dropping by our room with a slice of cake and wishing me a happy birthday. Will be sure to visit this amazing hotel again! Thanks Jeffery and team!

title: Great location, super staff, awesome food and drinks and the best view of Singapore City Skyline.
desc: Restaurant and bar superb, staff excellent, artwork within just brilliant, location awesome too so many things in walking distance and the view from 10th floor just WOW - best view of the city in Singapore in my humble opinion. Silly little things were annoyances on checking in - room door would not work (no battery in the lock) so we had to come back 40 minutes later and ended up in another room anyway. Then we get into the new room. No luggage in there. No towels either as apparently they had run out. Also, the rooftop bar unmanned and the phone not working, so we had to ring the reception from our handphone and ask to be connected to the bar. Annoyance, not a terrible experience. But weird for these things to happen.

title: The highlight of my 2021 staycations
desc: Possibly the best service I had ever experienced while on staycation in Singapore, with the staff providing an excellent experience through every aspect of the staycation, from introducing the artworks on display, to accommodating my many requests regarding the room and pool usage, and even bringing my food orders to the room. It is undeniable that the staff, especially Jane, went the extra mile to ensure my stay was comfortable and smooth. After such a great experience, I am eager to come back again. This is on top of the fact that the hotel and room design was gorgeous yet thoughtful with the guest's comfort and safety clearly considered from the materials on the wall to the art on display to the designer furniture in the rooms. I have no qualms recommending Hotel Naumi

title: Unique hotel experience
desc: Good that in covid hotel is still getting good biz. Busy at check in with other people waiting. Waiting time is understandable and reasonable as we were seated comfortably, but it looks like the malay man at the counter look very stressed and unsure what to do with our room. We were swiftly assisted by a chinese man at the counter and showed to the room by a indian lady, whom were both extremely great people. Room is nice and comfortable size, pool offers great city view. Location is good also with many food nearby. Overall a nice staycation.

title: Perfect for Photostaycay
desc: We are a couple with a 3mth old baby and specifically booked the Eden and Nirwana room for its bathtub and designer chair to do our photostaycay. Comfort was not our top priority but nice to have, which the beautiful italian armchair delivered..its perfect for breastfeeding! The enormous tub is also perfect for private swim sessions with our little one. Not recommended for parents with more than 1 child though.. the room is spacious but not super big. Hotel provided a cot for us as well, good to have! The room has super nice soft lighting, also perfect for our purpose. The AC isnt very cold at night, but daytime is ok. Not a dealbreaker for us though. The pool has fantastic view but crowded if you stay on a weekend or public holiday. We chose the day after a PH to do our

title: Great boutique experience
desc: Stayed at the Habitat room. Cozy and clean room with a nice vibe, and Naumi’s overall decor is really cute and modern. Service is really accommodating. Was a perfect girl’s getaway. Their humble infinity pool has a beautiful understated skyline view. Recommend for couples too.

title: Great Deal !
desc: Booked for the sunset deal which have early check in and late check out! Wonderful deal they got! I love their pool which able to see the CBD area. Overall, is a cozy hotel and have many friendly staff working here! Hotel is very convenient to both City Hall & Bugis Junction! Will definitely come back here again!

title: Perfect cozy boutique stay for husband and I
desc: Was an incredible stay with Naumi Hotel thanks to the amazing staff who made us feel right at home. Special mention to manager Faisal and staff Jane who made our stay enjoyable with their personal touch. Our couple stay without our son in tow after nearly 2 years was indeed a much needed getaway right in the heart of the city center.

title: Great Service
desc: Staff were always with a smile! Loved the service from all the staff, though the room could have been cleaned up better. There was a loose receipt from the previous occupant by the curtain, and the bedside table was slightly sticky... Otherwise, good one-night stay with attentive and cheery staff. We got the corner room but half the window view was obstructed by a wall and but at least the view was not great so didn’t miss much I guess.

title: One Night Stay
desc: One night night stay at Naumi hotel was fabulous!! Agoda screw up my booking ! Thank you to Jan who assist during check in and haslinda who accomadate to our late check out till 4 pm ! Last but not least special shoutout to the malay gentlemen i didnt get his name who is friendly and assist to send up our food delivery up to the pool side without us telling him! Kudos to Naumi Team ! Definitely will be back again ☺️

title: Memorable Staycay
desc: Naumi has been nothing but amazing ! Staffs are exceptionally friendly. Check-in and out are fast and smooth. Location wise very accesible. 5-10mins walk to Bugis Junction/MRT which makes it super easy to find food. Booked their habitat room that comes with a special promo for early check in and late check out! So worth the price. Love their rooftop pool. They offer a super beautiful view of the CBD area's skycraper. Would recommend to all. Definitely would stay here again !! :)

title: Everything is nice
desc: Booked habitat room with breakfast inclusive. The room is stunning and sleek. On top of that, very minimalistic concept. You can expect Apple TV as well. The pool view is a stealer and well “instagrammable” but on top of that their customer services are way better than some of the 5 stars hotel. Very bubbly and cheerful that they even introduce you the facilities of the room personally.

title: Welcoming and Friendly staff summaries a great stay!
desc: It was a great short staycation at Naumi Hotel. Love how the front desk and Concierge were so welcoming. Super loving the ambiance of hotel. And love how the front desk shared and tour us the amenities in the room! In overall, it was such a great stay in Naumi!

title: Fantastic service, food and rooftop
desc: Fantastic experience for the National Day, everything was fantastic. Staff and room service very gentle and professional. Very happy about the Italian restaurant and bar, they serve authentic Italian food and selection of more then 100 Italian wine by the glass .

title: Best service
desc: If you are looking for a different hotel experience, naumi is the place. Small luxury hotel where the staff are friendly and hospitable. So personalized you feel like vip here. Jeffrey I assume the manager, had especially left a great impression. He is passionate and enthusiastic in making his guests' day, you can have great conversations with him. Room are well equipped for a comfortable stay. There is also a italien restaurant that is worth trying. Would definitely recomend this hotel for the aesthetics and design, experience and excellent service.

title: Gem of a place
desc: The team was very helpful and responsive to my queries prior to check-in. Decor and design of the hotel was quirky yet elegant. Appreciate the art pieces around the property, especially at the lift lobby. Room booked was Eden & Nirwana and it felt luxurious from the bedding to the bathroom to the feature armchair piece. Liked that there is plenty of natural light in the room and even mood lighting was sufficient for the evening. Rooftop pool has a very chill vibe with lounge chairs and a great view. Breakfast at the restaurant was good as well. Staff were very friendly and approachable. Thanks to the team, including Lisa, Jane, Yunis, for the service. Would come back again!

title: Worst Staycation ever!
desc: I've stayed there for 2 nights. Pros - plenty of snacks available - room oasis has a good design - Friendly staff Cons - For check-in, I had to wait 3 hours to get a room available - Nobody gave me any promotion or offer breakfast during the booking - Bedsheet quality was terrible - Big gap from the floor to the door, I was able to hear everything that was going on in the corridor. In order to not be interrupted during my meeting calls (I was there for work purposes), I had to place a towel to minimize the sounds - At 10.30 pm I heard someone vacuuming - Horrible!!! - Nobody did room service during my stay Definitely is a place that I don't recommend. Expensive and not worth it! There are other places, near to the center with way better quality.

title: Best staycation with great customer service and friendly staff
desc: I applaud the reception team at the Naumi Hotel for their excellent service and friendliness. The check in was done quickly and it was coupled with an introduction to the room and facilities found at the hotel. The service by Yunis, Faizal and Lisa was one of the best I’ve ever experienced as they were attentive to detail, realising that it was the birthday of my partner and specially served us a cake that was on the house. They made the stay very enjoyable with their friendly yet polite attitude. Even though there was an event running at the pool, they were courteous enough to provide us an alternative pool slot which gave us access to the pool after hours. The room itself was good and well stocked with complimentary snacks and drinks, with everything in pristine condition

title: Amazing midweek stay
desc: We were lucky enough to catch the parachutes and jets at the rooftop pool in the evening! Amazing room and pool I must say. Good spot to catch National Day or NYE fireworks for sure. The staff were super friendly too and were nice enough to give us a late checkout. Highly recommended!

title: the best staycation i had in my whole life!!
desc: all i can say that i was happy and satisfied with my staycation! it was my first time doing it alone & was kind of nervous but the staff made it all feel better. during checking in i don’t have to do it at the reception desk. the staff was so nice to let me sit down at the seating area while filling up the form. the staff made an introduction about the room, it was so sweet & i didn’t expect that!! it was on my birthday & they gave me birthday cake! i would definitely come back! :) some pics from the stay! thank you so much!

title: Awesome Staycaytion
desc: It was a long National Day weekend. I was staying in Oasis overlooking the beautiful city skyline. I was greeted excitedly by Viri and her team. The room was ready when I reached the hotel at 2pm! The room service ensured that the room was cleaned on a daily basis and everyone was friendly and extremely helpful. The room was comfortable in every way.. from the King sized bed, luxurious bathtub, amazing view etc. The outdoor pool was clean. The view was breathtaking and IG worthy. Even though they have forgotten to sent us our breakfast on the last day (which they did after I called to remind), the overall standard of the hotel and exceptional service from the staff was almost impeccable. I will certainly be staying here again.

title: 5 star modern hotel with amazing cityscape pool and brilliant service!
desc: Modern hotel with amazing rooftop pool lounge and city view. Top notch service from their friendly staff. Their concierge, Faizal is especially warm, cheerful and friendly towards us. He is especially hospitable and is always smiling and showing enthusiasm when serving his guests. His vibrancy and energy made us feel very comfortable during our two day stay at the hotel. We would definitely recommend this hotel. Best service we have experienced in Singapore.

title: Still the best hotel that my partner and i love the most.
desc: Execellent crew and services. I had planned my proposal in Naumi Hotel and thanks to Viri and Faizal for their promply replies and coordination to help me plan my special day with my fiancee. When i checked in earlier to prepare the surprise for my fiancee there was a huge crowd and everyone was waiting to check in. All of us waiting from 3pm till around 4+ for the room to be ready. I guess it cant be help knowing there was so many people. The good thing was we were given late checkout at 4pm. I would like to give the crew a special thanks for coordinating and helping me plan the setup. They gave me reminder calls and assist with some of the setup. Thanks to them i was able to plan and setup in the pool area with the beautiful city view

title: Quick 2 night getaway!
desc: Recently did a 3D2N stay at the courtyard room. I'll be providing a comprehensive review on the overall property and service What is great? 1) Excellent service. Staff seems to know us by name. Very welcoming and assuring. You know they will do what they can within their means to deliver you the best service 2) Great View from the infinity pool with poolside bar 3) Modern and artsy vibe 4) Strong water pressure with constant temperature 5) In room smart TV with Apple and Netflix (Login yourself) What could be better? 1) Room size is slightly smaller than usual for my liking but its a boutique hotel so its understandable 2) No view in the courtyard room 3) No pillow selection - I am particular - In room pillows too soft for my liking 4) Sound proofing can be better. I can hear

title: Weekend getaway!
desc: Excellent service by Faizal for being attentive throughout our one night stay. Hotel offers a nice and cosy environment with wide food selection within reach. Pity we couldn't enjoy the pool facilities due to Covid-19 maximum capacity restriction. Room was clean and well maintained!

title: Ridiculous
desc: Supposed check in time @2pm. We arrived @3pm. Saw a full lounge of guests waiting to check in. Were told we should wait till 5pm, so we walked around till 6.30pm. Guess what, we were told we had to wait for another 2 hours. Losing my patience, I told the staff that this is the worst check-in service I’ve ever experienced, and I’d rather cancel the stay than tolerate another long wait. Faizal was understanding and settled the issue. We waited for another 15mins before the room was ready… The floor definitely looks uncleaned, and check out the gross toilet seat… but everything else’s good. The cleaning team attended to our notice at once. Would I recommend this hotel? Not really. Despite the staff’s best and earnest effort, the overall management affects the

title: Friendly staff and amazing room!
desc: From the moment I entered the hotel, I was greeted by Jane, who’s very friendly and helpful. She walked me to the room and explained all the in room amens. She also assisted to provide good recommendations when I ask her where is a good place to buy certain items. On my second day (5th August), I had to move to another room and the male recep staff who was working the afternoon shift that day, (I feel so bad that I had forgotten his name) is hands down one of the most genuine person I’ve met. He’s very friendly and has the always-willing-to help attitude. I requested for 2 sets of cutleries and their housekeeping staff came up to my room, passed it to me with a smile. Whenever me and my boyfriend enter or exit the hotel, the front desk staff will always greet us with a

title: Great hospitality 😊
desc: Upon arrival, was greeted by a friendly staff, Faizal. Check in was smooth and fast. Faizal gave us a short intro about the hotel otw to our room, showing the art display which was nice. Requested for the birthday package and they kindly prepared a halal cake for my sister, thank you! Got the habitat room, it was clean and cosy - things that I don't fancy is the toilet cus no bidet and I wish there is white light instead of all warm lights which make the room very dim but maybe that's the concept so nvm. Love the infinity pool and the rooftop view very much! And I have to mentioned Jane for accepting my late check out request, appreciated it very much:) The hotel was in a great location and convenient. Overall, I enjoyed my stay here in Naumi Hotel, will definitely come again!

title: Staycation
desc: Very pleasant stay with comfortable bed and pillows! As we checked in on a Saturday with many guests checking out late, we didn't get our room until around 5pm. Hotel check-in staff Jeffrey was very apologetic about the situation and offered to extend our check out too which was much appreciated. He also took the initiative to bring us the room key as we waited at the pool area. And showed us to our room and explained the basic amenities available as it is our 1st time staying in this hotel. Excellent service rendered! Will re-visit again for sure!

title: Amazing!
desc: Nothing to say, just amazing service from Jeffrey and rception team! From check in to check out, very accommodating to all requests! We love the bath toy given too! Highly recommend all to come for staycation!

title: Birthday Staycation
desc: We had a great staycation week ending off our stay at Naumi just because of their beautiful designer rooms they have. We got their Andy Warhol Theme for my partner’s birthday which they did a little decor on the bed with a champagne and a birthday Tiramisu Cake. I don’t drink so it’s a little extra gift for my partner. The Team over at Naumi are friendly and accommodating as well in terms of service; they are great. Even the housekeeping were tiptop with cleanliness of the room. The bathtub is so huge too although the water tank supply might not be suitable to fill the tub with hot water as the heat runs out after awhile filling it up or showering after a period of time. Pool has a nice view although towels were not available during the opening hours at 7am but you can always

title: Staycation
desc: It was very pleasant stay with comfortable bed and pillows! So cozy , clean and fresh. All Staff are approachable and friendly. During our check-in, the staff escorted us to our room and explained the basic amenities. It was an excellent service and great experience !

title: Birthday Staycation
desc: Everything is so perfect. Location, the room, the view and the amazing service. All the staff is so friendly and accommodating. Special mentioned to Ferlyn, thank you so much for extending my late check out for my birthday. Overall love it! Will return for my next staycation.

title: Fabulous food, views, room and service!
desc: Fantastic room, service, food and views! This is the best kept gem in singapore. I found the service to be exceptional. I stayed at Naumi in 2011 and ten years later, it heartens me to know that it is still a wonderful hotel! Thank you all at Naumi for working it work!!

title: Overall a good getaway
desc: Pros: - clean room - smart tv has prime video and netflix - spacious bathroom with nice tub - nice hotel deco and vibe - florian restaurant has amazing food - staff provided fantastic service - got a cute gift at check out - coffee machine has good capsule flavour Cons: - pricey - in room dining is self collection. They do not serve it to you in your room - no housekeeping - can hear noises outside the room Will come again

title: Disappointing
desc: Read many good reviews and we decided to book a night at this hotel over the weekend. However, it was not what we had expected. Shall start off with the good points: 1. The hotel is situated at a good location - walkable to City Hall, Bugis and Suntec. Train stations and buses are close by as well. 2. Complimentary mini bar 3. Bed was pretty comfy 4. The staff who checked us in, brought us right up to the room and gave a room tour - nice touch of service Despite the above points, here are the reasons why the stay was less than desirable. 1. Check-in process was quite long even though we were the second group to be checked in. Not sure if it was because of the groups that came after us and the reception got overwhelmed but we ended up loitering around and waiting

title: Great hotel, amazing service!
desc: The service at Naumi Hotel was amazing, kudos to the staff! The room was cosy and comfortable. The sunset to sunrise stay at the habitat room was well and truly worth it with the early check-in and super late check-out, have not come across such a deal anywhere else! Location is superb with many dining options nearby. Saving the best for last, the rooftop pool was absolutely incredible. The vibes and view of the city was exceptional, perfect spot to relax over a bottle of wine. Overall, it was a perfect stay!

title: Gorgeous rooftop pool!
desc: We booked with Luxury Escapes to enjoy the 8pm late checkout, complimentary wine etc. The time spent is invaluable! Stayed on a weekday - best part is having the gorgeous pool to ourselves at offpeak hours. Too chill, we loved it! Staff are sweet and nice, we stayed in a room that's basic but clean and homely. You cannot beat this location. We worked from cafes or our room or the pool everyday. Thank you for a great stay!

title: Best boutique hotel
desc: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay here at Naumi. We glad we chose this place as our Honeymoon after the wedding. Plenty of amenities in the hotel and also around the area. Food was easy to find around and also public transport is accessible within walking distance. The room was cozy and we enjoyed the big shower available. Thank you Naumi for the pleasant experience. Definitely will come back again

title: Different room from their website
desc: This was actually my second stay at Naumi Hotel since years back. Based on this experience, Naumi Hotel was once a great boutique hotel, but not anymore. Pros: Great service staff (Thank you for giving your best!) Cons: Badly maintained rooms, Late check-in times During check-in, the staff were welcoming with great smiles and directed us to a waiting area. After a short while, we were informed we had to wait ~1 hour for the room to be prepared. Note: That was at 3.30pm, and we had informed in advance that we will be arriving later than the stipulated check-in time due to an appointment. Although we questioned the delay despite informing earlier, we decided to shrug it off and went off for a walk. On return, we were brought to our 'Oasis room'. To our shock, the room was

title: Stylish & Sleek!
desc: Coming back to this hotel after a decade was indeed a great idea! What wonderful changes have been made to this stylish boutique hotel. The interior decor now is not only sleek but each room floor boasts a different theme. We’re just in awe with the cool art installations at the lift lobby especially the one with the birds… you got to have fun with that! The rooftop infinity pool overlooking the city skyline is simply to-die-for! To top it all, the hotel has an amazing team of staff with personalised service and full of smiles behind their mask! Thank you, Ms.Viri, Zul & Anson for making our stay a memorable one!

title: Minimoon
desc: Review on Naumi. Addressing few questions which is common. √There are many types of rooms with patio, tub and even a round tub √All rooms are non smoking but you get to swim and drink at the rooftop with a smoking corner, just like clubs √Infinity pool is so damn good that you can see all the lights around and perfect for pictures. There are comfy sofas, chairs and rocking chairs too √Rooms are well equipped and clean √Staffs are so friendly and accommodating. If service is very important to you at your stay, like me, this is the place like home √Accessible by train bus and car. Its just infront of Raffles Hotel, opposite Bras Basah Complex and an Italian restaurant right below @florian_singapore . I love this place! Its the place to celebrate your moments.

title: A quiet get-away in the middle of the city
desc: I chose this hotel to stay over the weekend to celebrate my hubby's birthday. We chose the one with a private garden and was really worth every penny! It was exactly what we both wanted and needed. It was private, cosy, near all the places we were going to, quiet, just lovely. I know when people read the word "lovely" it may not click. but there isnt any better word to describe it. You will understand it when you stay there. Breakdown: We called in to ask for early check in and we could check in as early as 10am. Late check-out is 2pm(depending on how full the hotel is) The room was at one corner of the hallway so no traffic from outside came by so in a way it was really private and comfy. it was like a holiday. the bed is soooo comfy that you'd just be tempted to KO in it

title: Patio Room
desc: Upon arrival, the receptionists were friendly and great. However, it took quite some time for the checking in due to many people. Had my stay in the Patio Room. The room itself is great but the patio was not. It was open and people on the higher ground can see you so there's no privacy in that sense. A bummer because I chose the room for its patio. For the following issues, they do not bother me as much, as I only had a night stay but they could be a problem to others or if my stay were to be longer. - The fridge was not clean. There's a smell to it. - There's no bidet which could be a hassle to some as the shower area is separated. -There was no body towel as well. There's only bathrobes. In spite of these issues, there are things that I enjoyed that made my stay a

title: Perfect getaway
desc: Great experience. Was introduced to the hotel and the room for the first time! Very pretty scenery at the pool spent the most time there.. Overall very Chill and relaxed. Love the 36h stay deal. Service, atmosphere and food was great. Will definitely recommend!

title: Could have been better!
desc: Stayed for 2 night & it was alright though staffs could be more meticulous to details. (Only knew abt the occasion/purpose of my stay at the very last hour) Did not managed to check the pool out. Experience could’ve been better. But pls do check out the current package the hotel offers for checking out at 8pm, that is a pretty good deal!

title: Nice hotel with a good location
desc: Had an enjoyable stay over at the hotel. Friendly staff all around. Will definitely have another staycation at the hotel in future. The complimentary snacks and drinks from the mini bar is a plus as well.

title: Staycay
desc: My recent staycation with my family at Naumi hotel was very enjoyable. Great ambience, posh new hotel with friendly staff and fantastic location being in the heart of town. I would definitely recommend anyone wanting a quick getaway to visit this hotel. Value for money. Room service was also prompt and food was tasty.

title: Cozy little room
desc: This stay happened in March 2021. We stayed for a night in their lead-in Habitat room at $220 per night. Room was small and cozy with a queen bed. Bathroom and Toilet were separate, next to our beds with a small counter area in front of it for us to prep our food and drinks. The basin and tap was designed to look good but bad in terms of use as it often splashes out of the sink wetting our clothes and the floor. It was raining the day we checked in and room was rather dark and gloomy the whole time due to the orange light. Hotel is near quite a number of eateries in the bugis/bras brasah area. 10-15min walk frok nearest train station

title: Comfortable and friendly
desc: When we came to the hotel room, everything looks beautiful here as what the picture seems. But the service here extended the warm welcome and we enjoyed our stay. It was a pity that we came on a Sunday and the bar closes at 3pm. Nevertheless, still a great short and worthwhile staycation in the city.

title: Great service
desc: We enjoyed the attentive and personalised service here. Rooms are cosy and well equipped, the free minibar is a nice touch. Our only complaint would be that our room was showing its age at parts. Overall a pleasant stay.

title: Great customer service
desc: Was a great experience for both my partner and I. Albeit the hiccups we encountered while checking in, the staff had helped us settle in amicably and hassle-free. Namely Rayan who had helped us with the hotel/room tour with extreme professionalism and maturity simultaneously letting us feel at home with the clear explanation of the different amenities available, and Tinesh whom during night shift had helped us with our queries in the wee hours, showing no signs of fatigue or reluctance to engage the guests and being of immediate assistance, also with our check out procedure and impeccable customer service. Will definitely commend the staff overall for their friendliness and courteous persona. Glad to say that we would be returning customers. Thank you, Naumi. 10/10.

title: Honeymoon choice hotel
desc: Awesome service!!! And a splendid exprience for the newly wedd❤ Cool modern hotel. Hotel that is conveniently located within tbe proximity of singapore shopping and entertainment hub. Such a beauty😍😍

title: World class service!
desc: Thoroughly amazed by the level of personalised service provided by the team from the moment we stepped into this boutique hotel. We were shown to our room and introduced - with a twist of humour - to the room amenities personally by one of the friendly staff. We accidentally broke a glass and apologised while asking for a housekeeper to vacuum the remaining shards. Not only did they not charge us for it, the team was extremely kind about the incident and even followed-up on the complimentary birthday cake that we had forgotten. I would like to specially commend Lily, the housekeeper, for her excellent service. She greeted us with a big smile, cleaned the entire room meticulously, changed the bin and floormat amongst other things just to ensure that the room is safe for us to

title: Coolest roof top bar
desc: Naumi singapore is amazing and their italian restaurant florian serves authentic cuisine Try out the venetian sunset cocktails. Coolest bar and great bartender . Another level❤️ coolest roof top view and bar and amazing guests! Great venue for celebration

title: Nothing but sorta AMAZING
desc: Nothing but sorta of amazing. Me and my partner was warmly welcome the moment we enter. They get us seated, great start to be treated like a VIP. Check in process was smooth, i dont have to stand in a queue. After check in, staff offered to escort up to the room and slide it in a little hotel tour by showing us the artefacts the hotel have(the one opposite the lobby lift) the frame picture was very interactive, quite cool actually. Infinity pool is perfect for an instagram shot. It overview the famous raffles hotel and the perfect skyline of Singapore. Room was fine. Loving this hotel concept and service. Will definitely come back.

title: Best service!
desc: We r impressed at the level of personalised service here at Naumi hotel. The young team led by the manager Jeffrey made this a great staycation. Check in took no time and the receptionist spend time to introduce you to the hotel and room. All staff were always smily and positive, even the housekeeping aunties. You can feel their passion for their job. Didnt manage to get their names. At check out we were encouraged by the manager jeffrey to share our experience, and we r more than happy to do so! Definitely will return and recommend! Great job!

title: Disappointing Experience
desc: Not what you should expect from a 5 star boutique hotel. Sheets and towels have stains, bathroom amenities were not replenished when housekeeping made the room and basic items such as sanitary bags were "not available". Though it was a birthday celebration, a 5 star hotel who is known for its service and is actually ranked in the top 30 on TripAdvisor should at least acknowledge the fact that it was my partner's birthday. We got no recognition from the hotel whatsoever. Service seriously leaves much to be desired. Only bright point of this entire experience was Marina's (Reservations Manager) service for helping me coordinate the entire decoration set up in the room. Other than that, not much positives.

title: Excellent staff, pleasant stay!
desc: Stayed here for a 2 nights’ staycation, blown away by the personalised service and welcoming attitude from the team of dedicated staff. Felt very personable and sincere. Deepest apologies for not getting their names, would have loved to thank them personally for making the stay an exceptional and memorable one. Check-in was seamless and the staff were nothing short of enthusiastic and welcoming, and they even took the time to explain the art décor and room design/amenities. Comfortable rooms and great beds right in the heart of the city centre. Great decor and the atmosphere was well done. Didn’t check out the pool, but views from the rooftop were impressive. Gym was well-equipped and empty on both occasions I used it (you have to call the front desk to have them give you the

title: Memorable Facilities, Forgettable Service
desc: It seems like my review has been flagged previously. I will write this again. Do improve your team. Wonderful facilities. However, hospitality service can be improved. I booked a 2 day 1 night stay at Naomi Hotel on the 30th - 31st of October 2021 as a surprise for my partner’s birthday. Check-in process was fast and efficient and we were ushered into our room by a receptionist. The swimming pool faces a scenic view of the City area. The gyms are cosy with sufficient equipments for a simple workout. The hotel room is clean and tidy. We love the cosiness of the room at Naumi. The last time we stayed at Naomi on the 3rd - 4th April 2021, we were impressed by the sincere hospitality treatment from the previous General Manager Viri, previous Front Office Manager Michelle as well

title: Staycation with family
desc: My recent stay at Naumi hotel was a great experience. The rooftop pool was nice and clean. The staff were all friendly. Check in was smooth and easy. Truly impeccable service and we had an awesome time as a family. Thank you very much to Sutha and Team!

title: MEMORABLE STAY IN THIS BEAUTIFUL HOTEL!
desc: Had an awesome time in this wonderful hotel as the entire experience was really pleasant with amazing staffs special mentioned to a beautiful lady named Sutha who is the floor manager. Hotel Staffs were very helpful with smiling faces, great service by the housekeeping staffs etc.. Wholly, worth the money and will definitely go again for the staycation!

title: One night staycation
desc: I stayed at naumi for 1 night. I was given a complimentary upgrade. The room was well maintained. And the staffs were really friendly especially the tall handsome chinese guy(did not get to catch his name) but during my checkout, he happened to catch a lift down and he asked about my stay. Overall a wonderful experience.

title: Pleasant Stay
desc: My family had a very plesant stay during our recent stay in Naumi Hotel. Everyone were friendly and approachable. The room was big enough for our family of 3. We hope to be back in 2022 for another great experience in Naumi. Thank you, all.

title: Excellent Service
desc: The service was great and efficient! Front desk staff were really genuine, friendly and helpful. Amazing hospitality provided. Definitely will stay here again with my family. And will recommend anyone to stay here.

title: Comfortable 3 Days 2 Nights Stay in Naumi Hotel
desc: Booked 2 nights stay on a whim, as I was curious on what would be the experience like staying in Naumi Hotel. Had walked past this hotel previously, and it looked nice from the outside. Was attended by Ferlyn during check-in and was pleasantly surprised when she offered to show me to the room. The room at Level 9 was comfortable and cosy. Loved the complimentary in-room snacks and drinks. Truffle chips and coconut drink are my fav. Was happy that I was able to connect to YT via the smart TV. Lovely sound system too. The hotel does not stinge with 6 coffee capsules provided and replenished daily. Housekeeping lady was friendly too as we bumped into each other the next morning. It was also very convenient to dine at Florian which was just downstairs. Level 10 is where the

title: 10/10 experience
desc: Had a wonderful stay over the weekend for my birthday! The room is beautiful and the hotel’s location is perfect! The sky pool is cozy with an amazing skyline! Shout out to Ms Sutha & the awesome front desk team!

title: Great place for special occasion!
desc: We had a great time here! The staff was super helpful and the room was spacious for us to set up the proposal :) the hotel is also near many good bars and eateries so very good place to have a staycay. highly recommend!

title: Weekend Getaway
desc: Our stay at the hotel was nothing but amazing. When we arrived, we were told that the check in would be delayed by an hour but was allowed a late check out. The booking of the gym and pool facilities were effortless as well. The room was very clean, new and comes with a free minibar. One thing that stood out was the staffs at Naumi - the service was impeccable and very friendly. :)

title: Good staycation
desc: Was a staycation. Hotel is new and clean. Nice pool with good view. Just our one nite stay. And enjoyable one too . Not forgetting many nice restaurants around this area. Walking distance to big shopping malls like Raffles City and Bugis Junction.

title: Great staff, amenities and location!
desc: I would to comment on the front desk officer, Tinesh. My partner did the check in and secretly requested for a cake for my birthday. Tinesh checked if we had any dietary restrictions as the cakes available at the hotel weren’t not halal. He assured my partner that he’ll look out for alternative. He then came to our room later with a lil cake and wish me personally. I was touched that he went extra mile in catering to our dietary restrictions. Clearly shows that he’s attentive to details. Not only that, he shared with me about the hotel amenities and restrictions during this pandemic. He was calm, professional and thorough when explaining to me when I came in later to check in and fill up some travel declarations. He’s truly a great asset for the company and did an impeccable

title: Staycation
desc: A very good service by Wan Ting and a guy during checkin. Room wasn’t ready when we came hence we were given late checkout.
