We were also brought to our room by her and she explained that the room layout is different from the one we saw on the net. The room is clean and spacious. The bed is very comfortable. Sadly it was raining hence we were unable to head to the pool. Would definitely come back again for another short break from work. Thank you Naumi Hotel :)

title: Staycation
desc: The front desk service was very good and the room is comfortable will definitely come back again. And I enjoy the stay. Also having free complimentary mini bar so was having a enjoyable time here in Naumi hotel

title: Amazing Stay
desc: Checked in on Tuesday so it was fast & smooth check in. Shout out to Ferlyn for greeting us at the door & handled us. Even gave us a quick hotel tour & room tour. She was very polite. Ferlyn went the extra mile & sent my breakfast order up to my room!!! Kudos to her service. Even to Anson too - he was very polite, friendly & courteous. Even waved goodbye upon checking out. Room was amazing & very cosy. It felt so much at home. I had the Oasis room with tub. F&B all are complimentary from hotel. Bed & pillows were very comfy. Had a great view of Pan pacific, jw marriott view. Only thing is that the toilet has no bidet. Night view at the pool & lounge was beautiful. It has Apple TV & screen mirroring for Android. For u to watch Disney+ Netflix etc. For those who love art like

title: Pleasant staycation at Naumi hotel
desc: Hotel is situated at a convenient location with many eateries nearby. Staffs are very friendly which add on to my pleasant stay. The pool is pretty small but has a Wonderful view from up there. Overall I recommend this hotel and would love to come back again.

title: Good room but marred by poor customer service
desc: My husband and I checked in Xmas day; stayed in the Eden & Nirwana room under the hotel's Designer Sojourn Lifestyle package. Was willing to pay a premium as we wanted to treat ourselves. After checking-in, the receptionist gave our room key and that's it. No offer to help to book the things included in our hotel package. They told us to give them a call from our room. When we settled into our room & called the reception, we were left on voicemail and this happened about 8 times during our entire stay. I had to physically go down to the reception to make my bookings & requests. We even missed the opportunity to book a swimming pool timeslot because there was no staff to answer our calls. When we came down for breakfast the next morning, there was zero staff at the

title: If you're looking for luxury, this is it 👌👌
desc: I travelled to Singapore with my mum and we stayed here. Everything was tiptop ❤️ the check in was flawless, the front desk was highly effective and smooth. The staff are very friendly and helpful. The rooms are exceptional, spacious and well lit and fresh. The hotel is very clean, everything is just over the top. Thank you and especially to the front office and the manager who made us feel welcome and at home. We must come back soon in 2022.

title: Infinity pool not to be missed!
desc: Great overall experience, service staff was very friendly and warm. Visit to the pool is a must! The view from the infinity pool is totally amazing. Can see the skyline of the business district. Wonderful to have a dip in the pool especially in this hot Singapore weather! Pleasant stay indeed.

title: Amazing Team
desc: Had to write a review as the entire experience from the check-in to the housekoeeping staff were amazing,.super accomdating and helpful. Wish I could have stayed longer. Will definitely be back again. Thank you and keep up the great atmosphere

title: Staycation with bestie!
desc: My bestie and I recently did a staycation at Naumi Hotel. The service rendered was exceptional and wondrous. The room was clean and well maintained. The staff by the name of Sutha is very professional and diligently answered some questions I had. My bestie and I had a jolly good time and we are eagerly awaiting to go back again soon for our next re-charging staycation!

title: Getaway
desc: Wanted to take a break from work..Chill with friends .. Wanted to give Naumi a try.. Never stayed there before..Had a wonderful experience. Great staff, rooms were clean & nice and loved the roof top pool.. Will come again…Possibly a longer stay next time..

title: Fantastic Stay
desc: We celebrated our daughter's birthday in Naumi and were pleasantly surprised with the effort, the staff put in to make it a memorable one for all of us. We had a great time at the rooftop pool and the view was magnificent. Beautiful hotel with great staff.

title: Poor service. No recomended
desc: Not clean. I asked to clean my room two days. You cannot reach anybody on recieption. Nobody try to help you. I called to recieption several times and recievd an answer one or two times. To repair safe box took two days

title: One of the Best Hotel
desc: We were checked in to a room with a bathtub and it’s amazing for couple stay. It was my girlfriend birthday and the hotel provide us a cake and wine. We really loved the pool with the beautiful view. The staff were friendly. Planning to go next year again.

title: Wonderful, memorable, best experience ever!
desc: My girlfriend and I had a staycation in the hotel for 2 nights. Best choice we made for December holidays, couldn’t have asked for more. It was a quick and efficient check-in. We spent a whole lot of time at the rooftop pool. Loved the scenery, a must visit spots in SG! Service staff was kind enough to provide us an umbrella when we wanted to get some dinner outside the hotel, took initiative to approach and give us the umbrella when we were walking out. A small but great 5 star boutique with beautiful sculpture and outstanding staff service! I would recommend here anytime any day !

title: Amazing experience!
desc: It was a special occasion for me and my wife! We were so amazed by the hospitality provided by the staff, extremely helpful to arrange the decor in our rooms making the stay more special! Will sure to come back here again with after the great service from such friendly and helpful staff.

title: Great Location & team
desc: Had a great me time and this hotel was a great experience. Hotel staff new exactly when and where to give me my space as they remembered when I checked in that I needed privacy during my stay. Their attention to my needs is really something I will remember. Thank you front office team

title: Bad hotel management: Over Promises, Under Delivers
desc: My partner and I booked the hotel to celebrate our anniversary with Klook on a package that includes: - 1-night accommodation at Naumi Hotel Singapore (which was not pleasant due to the hotel being understaffed and not efficient) - Enjoy a 1-Night Stay at Designer Room for Two (did not happen and got downgraded to Oasis room due to their reasons being "some guests extended their stay due to VTL thus we are not able to get our room". Guess what, they only called us the morning that we were supposed to check-in when they could have told us in advance so that we could cancel our stay or they could elevate the experience for us. The first thing they told us was they would compensate us with a set lunch. Come on, not everything is about compensation, we booked a boutique hotel for

title: Amazing stay
desc: We arrived yesterday and we were given the room with bathtub. It was upgraded room which was very nice of the hotel. Room interior was nicely design. Located centrally and very accessible to everywhere in the city. No regrets and we will definitely come back again next year.

title: First impression not good
desc: For a very expensive hotel, the first impression is not a good one. First I had was dropped off across the street because the loading zone for guest that stated no parking had a van parked in that location. Then I sat and waited for checking while everyone else that came after me got their room key immediately upon arrival. I sure hope it gets better than this.

title: Small, boutique rundown hotel
desc: The hotel was quite run down - with amenities that were small and the room was fairly old and worn out. Apple TV didn’t quite work and the wifi was wonky. Overall, they tried to provide good service with the one staff that they have at the front desk.

title: Excellent workacation venue!
desc: Very nice and conducive environment for workstation! Staff are friendly and very helpful. Couldn't have asked for better service. Room is clean and well equipped. And the central location helps! Thank you!

title: Noisy surrounding with bad service.
desc: Firstly, we came on time for check-in at 3pm but were greeted by a long queue of other customers checking in. There were 7 groups before us and 4 groups behind us.. There was no proper line or instructions given to us and so we had to figure out what these queues are for. There were no welcome greetings at all and the lobby is just crowded. Secondly, there's only 2 staff handling the front desk even though the crowds were overwhelming. When it came to our turn 30 minutes later, we were told that our rooms are not ready and there's a waiting time of at least 1 hour to get our room, and that they will call once our room is ready. So we had to request on leaving our bags with with the reception and we head out, took a walk and have some bites at the café around the corner. We

title: Our Anniversary
desc: Definitely one of the jems in Singapore which we discovered and it is on Par with most top quality! Top five star hotel in Singapore! Not forgetting to mention syukran who took care of us during our entire stay in the hotel thanks for the pleasant staycation and memorable experience for our anniversary, will come again!

title: Good friendly staff
desc: Syukran was friendly and helpful with check out and queries. It's a great weekend getaway for a solo traveller as all staff were very friendly . Including restaurant, rooftop bar. Service is top notch.
